K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112a-1: sarba ta th'a ga ta pud tro phu na gu hya ba no shi aa shvad da ma bi na sa ma h'a tantra n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-0: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la @112b phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-1: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-2: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas; sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-3: mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-4: bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-5: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyi tshogs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar phyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-6: kun tu 'phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed padma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas gzhal yas khang par du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-7: 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-8: 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzang 'dod pa'i yon tan gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-9: dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-10: ro bro ba sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-11: reg bya 'jam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:112b-12: chos kyi bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par phye bar sgo bzhi sgo khang dang bcas par bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113a-1: tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113a-21: don thams cad yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113a-26: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-1: rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-16: snying po blo gros rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-17: de dag kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshogs dang 'khril pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-25: padma dbang byed rnams kyang rang rang gi 'phrin las kyis bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-26: gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug brtse ba'i dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-32: mthun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-33: de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:113b-34: 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-1: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po padma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te thugs ka'i dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa bkye bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-2: des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-3: ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po bco brgyad byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-4: de nas snod dang bcud du bcas pa gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-5: de dag gis kyang cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-6: de yang zhing khams rnam par spyong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas ba 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnas su 'dus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-7: de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen bo'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-8: de'i dus na mthun par gleng ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-9: kye ma ho ya mtshan sna tshogs chos; ;rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-10: cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-11: dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114a-12: rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-0: gsang gsum dam tshig @114b spro mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-1: de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-2: gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-3: khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-4: dgongs don rgya mtsho don mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-5: bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-6: legs par zhu zhing gsol gdab mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-7: de nas gsang pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-8: rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal ba kun la mchod de lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-9: rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-10: ae ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-12: ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-14: byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-15: nyon mongs la sogs sbyong mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-16: thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-17: tshogs pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-18: sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-19: gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-20: khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-21: zab cing phra la rgya che bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-22: 'khor rnams the tshom ri bos non //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:114b-23: thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-2: mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-3: dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-4: smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-6: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g-yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-9: de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-10: de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas gzigs pa'i mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-12: mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bkod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-20: sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-21: 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115a-25: dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-0: kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang @115b mi 'gog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-2: mthar yang mi gnas shing nam mkha' lta bur bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-3: de nas ting nge 'dzin de la zhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-4: de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g-yo bar mdzad pa'i glus g-yo slong bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-5: tshul phan don gyi rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-6: 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-7: nam mkha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-8: nam mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-9: thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-10: kye ma'o mgon po don kun nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-11: zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-12: byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-14: zhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-15: de nas yang yum gzi ldan padmo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-16: mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam 'das brjod dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-17: bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-18: mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-19: rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:115b-20: de skad ces kyang bskul ba'i rjes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-0: mgon po'i gnas rnams la dgongs @116a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-1: nas; ;'od zer rnams bkod 'dzum mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-2: 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-3: legs so legs so rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-5: yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-6: gnang zhing bstan par mdzad pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-7: dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-8: gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-9: ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-10: thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-11: don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-12: gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-15: rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-17: dga' ba'i bzhin bzang rgyas mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-18: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-20: de nas gzi ldan padmo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-21: 'dzum mdangs rgyas pas bskul mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-23: dga' bzhin chags par rnam par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-24: ae ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-25: thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-27: phyogs rig med pas go 'byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116a-28: yul du gyur ba kun rgyud dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-0: mi dmigs @116b cho 'phrul nam mkha' las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-1: bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-2: thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-3: sna tshogs las brgyad dag par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-4: de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-5: ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-6: rang gis mtshan mas rab mdzes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-7: rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-8: phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-9: phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-10: mi dmigs nam mkha'i dbyings dag na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-11: rdo rje sprul sku mngon phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-12: gzi ldan padmo chen mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-13: rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-14: 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-15: 'khor rnams slong ba'i sngags brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-16: aom a'a h'um mah'a bhasmi sha ku ru bi na hri da ya aam bha ba hi aa la la ho /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-17: gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-18: dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-19: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-20: rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-21: dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-23: dkar 'tsher dag ba'i rang bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-24: dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-25: gsal khyab kun tu spros pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-26: dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas thon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-28: byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:116b-29: gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-1: bkod; ;ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-2: brjid dang bcas pas gar mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-3: 'dzum pa mdzad dang rol pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-4: kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam; ;smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-5: rdo rje phur bas g-ya' bas slong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-7: rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-8: rigs kyi 'phrin las sna tshogs sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-9: nam mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-10: rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-11: byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-12: rol pa'i char nyid mngon 'bab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-13: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-14: brtan dang g-yo ba ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-15: sangs rgyas zhing khams dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-16: byang chub sems tshogs rol pa las; ;brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-17: sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-18: kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-19: sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-20: yang dag bde la rab gnas mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-22: phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-23: thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-24: byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod; ;rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrog shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-25: dbang po tshim pa'i ro rtsed dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-26: gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117a-27: stong gsum gang bar gsung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-0: bcom ldan @117b padmo bde yang bde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-1: gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-2: ae ma 'dus pa'i tshogs dbus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-3: thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-4: 'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas; ;rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-6: dkyil 'khor dag la lhun grub rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-7: padma'i dpal ldan sems pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-8: 'phrin las ye shes gnas kun spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-9: khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-10: khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-11: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-12: mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-13: de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-14: phyag rgya chen po'i gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-15: de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-16: sngon gyi rgyud dang lam bzhi las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-17: sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-18: sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-19: dgongs shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-20: rang bzhin gnas nas kun dgongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-21: phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-22: kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-23: byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-24: rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-25: bdag dgongs 'gro ba'i don chen mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-26: kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-27: thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-28: rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:117b-29: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-2: dga' ba'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-3: so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-4: chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-5: kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-6: btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-7: bya ba grub pa'i ting 'dzin mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-8: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-9: rang dga'i bskum pas g-yo mdzad de; ;phyogs bzhi byang chub dga' nas 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-10: kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-11: byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-12: nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-13: rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-14: 'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-15: ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-16: thams cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-17: rang gi bde chen don ston mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-19: sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-21: thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-22: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-23: rdo rje 'chang ba stan las langs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-24: bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-25: bskum pas dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118a-26: kye ma ho mchog gsum dam tshig sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-0: ye shes bla na med @118b pa'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-1: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-2: rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-3: rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-4: de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-5: thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-6: ci phyir theg chen mchog tu bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-7: yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-8: thugs rjes dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-9: mgon po'i padma'i sku de nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-10: gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-11: dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-12: gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-13: theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-14: lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-15: sangs rgyas sras bcas bsdus mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-16: gzhan 'phrul gnas tshogs g-yo mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-17: stong gsum 'di dag sbyong mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-19: sku las 'od zer spro bar mjad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-20: des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-21: ye shes 'od mdangs sems dpa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-22: gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-23: phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-24: zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-25: dmar gsal padma r'a ga'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-26: g-yas g-yon zhal gnyis sngo dang ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-27: rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-28: phyag na pad sdong bum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-29: rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:118b-30: mtha' mas mda' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-0: @119a *// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-1: phyag rgya'i yum bcas rol pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-2: gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-3: rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-4: dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-5: bandha dril bu sogs kyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-7: pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-8: padmo rdo rje sogs pas spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-9: 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-10: gnas rnams kun tu rin chen khri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-12: phyi rol bar khyams 'khor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-13: snod rnams kun tu padma la; ;thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-14: nyi ma zla ba rkyang pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-15: de nas padma rnam dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-16: dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-17: dgyes pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-18: thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-19: de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-20: mkha' klong rnam par dag pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-21: rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-22: sna tshogs sna tshogs shar ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-23: gsung nyid yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-25: cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-26: thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya; ;sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-27: rgyal po bder gshegs yab yum dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119a-28: byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-1: phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-2: rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas mjes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-3: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-4: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-5: de tshe mgon po bde chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-6: rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-9: byang sems kam las rnam 'phrul pa'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-10: bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-11: zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-12: gtso bo'i cha lugs ji ltar bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-14: bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la; ;r'a ga padmo h'um zhes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-15: sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-16: las kun grub par mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-17: gang gi padma sha ri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-18: budha h'um gis bsnan byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-19: zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-20: grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs gsog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-21: sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-22: yun ring gnas pa gnas pa gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-23: 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la; ;yi ge ja yis gdags byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-25: rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes pas bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-26: thugs rje skal ba'i glu dang sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-27: 'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-28: dam tshig gsum ston sngags kyi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:119b-29: dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-5: gsal mjad gnyis su med pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-6: rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-7: gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-8: 'od zer rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-9: yi ge a'a nas aa:yi bar //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-14: chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-15: rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-16: mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-17: de bzhin ka nas ksha yi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-18: sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-19: brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-21: ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-22: sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-23: chos mang ye shes zag pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-24: slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-25: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-26: gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-27: bkra shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120a-28: wam las rnam 'phrul tshe mtha' yas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-2: chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bsgrubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-4: shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-5: gam las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-6: dmar ser zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-10: pad gnas glegs bam me long 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-11: nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-12: ngam las sprul pa'i spyan dag ma //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-15: byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-16: tsam las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi chu shel mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-19: dpal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-20: cham las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-21: zhal gcig phyag bzhi bee d'ur ya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-23: lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-24: dzam las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-25: zhal gcig phyag gnyis gur gum mdog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-29: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma rgad mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:120b-30: rin chen pad srungs za ma tog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-8: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ljang skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-9: ku sha'i chun po'i aa mra'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-10: byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-11: pam las sprul pa'i don yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-12: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-13: rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-14: rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-16: zhal gcig phyag bzhi karti ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-17: rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-18: shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-19: bam las sprul pa'i las chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-20: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-22: lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-23: bham las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-24: zhal gcig phyag bzhi padma'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-25: phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-26: nub gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-27: mam las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-28: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:121b-29: zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-2: bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-3: tsakra bsgyur rgyal ma lus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-4: mtshan dang dpe byang sna tshogs brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-5: rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-6: yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-7: zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-8: rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-9: tri shul thod bcas padma'i lcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-11: drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-12: khva las sprul pa rtse ba'i dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-13: zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-14: rin chen dbyug pa padmo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-15: thod rnga rdo rje myu gu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-16: ram las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-17: zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-18: padma dang ni dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-19: thod sprul ras sngon ba dan 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-20: lam las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-21: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-22: rdo rje rgya gram padmo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-23: gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-24: rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-25: 'khor bcas rngam pa'i mdangs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-26: lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-28: sham las sprul pa'i byin dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-29: zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-31: me yi thod pa ri mos mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122a-32: kham las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-0: @122b zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-1: rin chen rtse dgu bgrang phreng dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-2: padma'i lcug ma sdigs mjub mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-3: sam las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-4: zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-5: dbyug pa rtse gcig padma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-6: dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-7: ham las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-8: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-9: ral gri lcags kyu dag sta dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-12: rang 'od rigs mthun yum dang rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-13: drag po'i rgyan tshogs ma lus 'gengs padma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-14: ka las bde ba'i blo gros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-15: zhal gcig phyag bzhi nam mkha'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-16: yum bcas rdo rje dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-17: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-18: kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-19: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pu sha ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-20: rin chen pi wang phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-21: rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-22: ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-23: zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-24: padma'i lcug ma zla ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-25: 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-26: gha las sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-27: zhal gcig phyag bzhi mar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-28: 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-29: rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-30: tsa las shes rab snang ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:122b-31: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-3: tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-4: zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-5: rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-6: dpa' bo longs spyod padma'i spyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-8: zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs dmar gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-10: mu tig chun po za ma tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-11: dzha las sprul pa'i drag shul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-12: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-14: ral gri 'bar ba g-yas dang g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-15: ta las sprul ba'i dri ma sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-16: zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-17: nyi ma'i phreng ba gand'i rdeg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-18: chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-19: tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-20: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa la sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-21: seng+ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-22: rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-23: las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-24: zhal gcig phyag bzhi r'a ga'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-25: ri bo padma chu dri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-26: gser nya 'phyo ba'i rdzing bu yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-27: dha las 'phros pa'i dra ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-28: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang gu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-29: rgya gram dril bu 'phro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-31: ta las sprul pa'i lag bzang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-33: padma'i rgyal mtshan dkar dmar mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123a-34: dri yi gzhong pa ku sha'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-0: zhal gcig @123b phyag bzhi mthing ga'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-1: glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-2: rin chen mdzod dang zla ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-3: da las rin chen snye ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-4: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad r'a ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-5: padma'i sdong bu dpag bsam shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-6: bandha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-7: dha las chos kyi mthong ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-8: zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-9: go cha ye shes sgron ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-10: dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-11: sna tshogs sprin phung ser gra bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-12: mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-13: bha las gzhon nu rin chen ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-14: zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-15: rgya gram 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-16: 'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-17: sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-18: rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-19: yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-20: gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-21: nya ma na las 'phrul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-22: rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-23: rigs kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-26: padma rdo rje rim sogs mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-27: zhal gcig phyag bzhi yum dang 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-28: 'og ma'i phyag mtshan mthun pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-29: rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-30: padma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-31: me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes; ;shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-32: byang chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:123b-34: ya wa ra las sprul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-0: @124a *// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-1: dmar ljang padmo me long dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-2: rin chen phreng ba pi wang gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-3: mchod pa las mdzad nang gi mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-4: sha sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-5: padmo tshim byed la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-6: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-7: bdug spos me tog dung dang dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-8: 'gying tshul tri sh'ul las kyi tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-9: mchod pas phyi yi mtshams na gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-10: de dag gi gsang sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-11: aom dhe hi r'a ga padma shi ri pu ta h'um h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-12: aom padma ma h'a dha ba ra bu na si ta mah'a dha ma hri da y'a h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-13: brad tang ya dza sv'ah'a; dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-14: aom tsakra aa lo ka na ma raksha sam bha ratna hri ti ba ya ba ti dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-16: aom badzra da ra ba kri ta ya ni sham ra ti pa sham ni dza sv'ah'a; shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-17: aom ratna ku ti du manta bandha bandha du na du na bi dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-19: aom bi sha tsi na dha ma ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-21: aom mam ma aa ba le ka na ru ru yu ru si de bhyo de satva ma ma h'um dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-22: rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-23: aom bi lo ka n'a ma si tan ma ku ru ku ru bo dhi satva bha ra bu na dza h'um dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-24: rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124a-25: aom bindha bindha sarba karma si de de bi ku ru bu ta sam bo ha h'um aom aam dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-0: lha mo rnams @124b kyi'o; ;aom aa pasma ra kro dha sni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-1: yaksha h'um h'um h'um bi tam pa ka phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-3: gsang sngags rgyal po mi zad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-4: rnam par sprul pa sku yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-5: stong gsum gnas nas g-yo mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-6: rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-7: de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-8: bde chen gar gyi dbang phyug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-9: dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-10: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-11: dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-12: rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-13: gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-14: rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur; ;aom na ma sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya w'a ka tsitta mah'a bo dhi hya su tram tri sha shu dhe so na khya h'um h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-15: aom rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-16: sarba bu ta ku ru ratna ma ma ku ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-17: aa aa b'irya sad ma ma ku aa bhi shinytsa aom a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-18: aom padma aa mo ka sa ma ya shr'i ha ha ha tshindha ma ni aa smi sha bi ma ma ya h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-19: sngags gsum gyis gsal bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-20: aom bi sha tsa ni dha ma ni aa ba sam bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na bi bud pa pam da h'um h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-21: rnam par spro ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-22: aom ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma sil du tri si h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-23: dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngags so; ;aom aam aa aa min du she ma la sha na du na dhe ta th'a ga te bhyod ti padma ku ru a'a:h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:124b-25: aom padma mu kham padma ba ba sa bo ti di ra yam gu ru h'um h'um h'um ham ham darsha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-2: aom na ma su tram bho ga ga na gu ma le sam s'a ra h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-3: rig pa mchog gi sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-4: aom ba ga ga pa sam po padma dha ae hye hi mah'a k'a ru ma da aa ma dhu na dza dza; spyan drang ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-5: aom padmo sam ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ma ye stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-7: aom aa mu ka si na ma sarba bhyo ga ga ta pu tsa me da na da h'um tri sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-9: aom padma bi lo ku ma la su ni tu tr'am sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-11: dgyes par bya ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-12: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-13: rdo rje gsang ba rmad byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-14: sku dang gsung thugs gsang sngags che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-15: byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-16: bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-18: dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-19: de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-20: rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-21: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-22: rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-23: rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-24: 'gro ba'i snang ba dam pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-25: rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-26: dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-27: phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-28: ae ma'o chos sku mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-29: ae ma'o chos rnams ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-30: ae ma'o chos kun rnam par 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-31: rgya che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-32: dkyil 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125a-33: thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-1: thabs mkhas pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-2: bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-3: sa dang sa 'das don chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-4: ta th'a ga ta'i byin rlabs dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-5: la la sku dang gsung dang thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-6: zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-7: gsang gsum gnas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-8: ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-10: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-13: dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-15: dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-16: rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-17: dgyes pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-18: ae ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-19: gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-20: dri med dang ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-22: byang chub sprin phung ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-23: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-25: khro bo 'byung ba ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-26: byin rlabs cho 'phrul ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-27: tha ba rlan mdzad ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-28: 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-30: dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-31: za 'og rim pa ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:125b-32: rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-2: chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-3: sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-4: 'khor rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-5: rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-6: rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-7: de tshe byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-8: 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-9: dga' ba chen po'i mchod pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-10: gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-12: rang gi rtog pa'i mtha' zhes rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-13: dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-14: rin chen chu des dbang bskur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-15: rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-16: 'gro ba'i don byed nus dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-17: las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-18: rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-19: thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems; ;sangs rgyas brtan pa 'di gnyer ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-20: byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-21: 'dus ba'i gnas lnga rig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-22: aom gu hya badzra sa ma stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-24: rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-25: gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-26: rigs kyi dgongs pa ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-27: rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-28: skal bzang dam tshig chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-30: dka' yi bsgo ba'i don chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-32: dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126a-33: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-0: @126b dbang thob las mdzad chen po des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-1: bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-2: rnal 'byor lugs su byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-3: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-4: mnyam 'gyur gsel ba rab tu btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-5: 'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-7: mngon spyod ya mtshan ston par spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-8: bka' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-9: smra bsam yul las rab 'das kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-10: dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-11: yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-12: gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-13: ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-14: gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas; ;brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-15: mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-17: stobs mchog seng+ge chen po la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-18: logs su btud de phyag 'tshal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-19: rmad byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-20: gsol btab blo mchog seng+ge khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-21: bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-22: stobs mchog seng+ge gsang bdag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-23: gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-25: bdag la zhus cig spobs par byos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-26: slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-27: kun gyis mthun pa'i tshig smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-28: mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mtshog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-30: byang chub sems dpa' rje btsun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-31: chos rnams ston pa'i gnas lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:126b-32: bcom ldan gsang mchog dam pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-1: sngags lam rnams mi ston cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-2: dgongs mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-3: rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-4: 'khor ni tshogs la bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-5: gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-6: zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-7: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-9: sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-10: de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-11: bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-12: dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-13: de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-14: rnam par brjod pa mi mdzad pas; ;yang dag don gyi snying po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-15: rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-17: byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-18: smra bsam las 'das brjod med pas; ;tshig tu brjod pa legs ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-19: gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-20: tshig gi snang bas the tshom skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-22: 'das dang ma byon thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-23: da ltar byung bar dgongs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-24: ma gsung mi gsung gsung du med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-25: de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-26: spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-27: kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-28: mtshan ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-29: don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127a-30: rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-0: 'dus tshogs 'khor gyis yang zhus @127b pa; ;stobs mchog seng+ge de ltar na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-2: tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-3: gsang ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-4: ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur; ;dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-5: dbang bskur thob par zhu ba spobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-6: bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-7: zhus shing stobs mchog seng+ge khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-8: nges kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin; ;rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-9: phyag 'tshal rmad byung mchod rdzas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-10: rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-11: kye ma ston pa thugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-12: phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-13: byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-14: tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-15: ma 'ongs dgra la brten pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-16: don la reg par mi 'gyur phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-17: mtshon bya mtshon par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-18: snying po byang chub don 'di la; ;dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-19: gsang ba de nyid bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-20: de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-21: ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-22: phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-23: rmad byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-25: rmad byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-29: aa nu bo dhi tsitta aa nanta garbha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-30: mah'a sat'a phra ta aa h'um; 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-31: sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-32: rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:127b-33: gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-2: bshad kyi rigs kyi bu rnams nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-3: don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-4: yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-5: de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-6: mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi gdengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-7: ji srid blo yi chos dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-8: gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-9: bsam brjod kun rdzob ces bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-10: de las 'das pa don dam yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-11: sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-12: snang ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-13: dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-14: yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-15: thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-16: thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-17: zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-18: de nyid bla med mchog dam pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-19: de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-20: aa la la yi sgra brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-21: stobs mchog seng+ge dri ba dris //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-22: de ltar legs so bcom ldan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-23: sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-24: spyod la gnas pa gang dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-28: gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-30: mtshan nyid rnam dag dus lags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-31: bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-32: dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-33: legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-34: rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128a-35: 'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-0: lta spyod gnyis ldan bden @128b pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-1: rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-2: bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-3: yang dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-4: rnal 'byor sa spyod sa thob shag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-5: ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-6: thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-7: bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-8: yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-9: kun rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-10: phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-11: med pa ma yin mtshan med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-12: rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-13: slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-14: lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-15: bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-16: che chung mthu yis grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-18: don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-19: yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-20: gnyis med don dam bden par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-21: sna tshogs chos kyi g-yul ngo bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-22: rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-23: zhes pas dgyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-25: de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-26: de nas rig pa'i skyes bu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-27: gsang ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-28: bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-29: dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-30: las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-31: ye shes sgron ma ci ltar legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:128b-32: rgyal bas dgongs pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-2: mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-3: sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-4: bde ba che las gzhan med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-5: lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa'i tshogs chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-6: rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-7: sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-8: dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-9: gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-10: phyag rgya gar thabs dbang bsgyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-11: 'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-12: dngos po thams cad bral ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-13: phung khams skye mched rnam par dben //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-14: gzung 'jin rtog pa'i yul bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-15: dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-16: rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-17: 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-18: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-19: rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-20: skye dang skye med sna tshogs dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-21: phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-22: de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-23: bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-24: ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-25: me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-26: rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-27: 'gag pa med pa'i chos rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-28: byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-29: mnyam nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-30: ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-31: sna tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-32: rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129a-33: gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-0: @129b gnas dang gnas med byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-1: ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-2: rgya cher so sor gsal ba'i ngang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-3: kun rtog byang chub sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-4: dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-5: dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-6: bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-7: ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-8: bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-9: spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-10: spro bsdu 'dun dang spros bral ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-11: mdzad pa'i byang sems brtan pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-12: ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-13: ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-14: rang gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-15: rgyal bas bshad pa'i dgos don la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-17: mchod dang zhal dag sgra 'byin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-18: rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-19: byang sems de nyid bstod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-20: ae ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-21: ae ma'o dag pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-22: ae ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-23: ae ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-24: ae ma'o so so rang gi sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-25: ae ma'o bya byed lhun gyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-26: de bzhin nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-27: bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-28: byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-29: bdag cag rig 'dzin tshogs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-30: byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-31: 'jug dang ldang dang gnyis med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-32: rang gi byang sems g-yo bar bgyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-33: reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-34: nyams su myong bar 'tshal lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:129b-35: thugs rje che dgongs byin gyis rlobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-0: @130a *// bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-1: de skad tshig tu gsol btab pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-2: bcom ldan snying po 'di skad gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-3: sna tshogs rnam dag ngo bo nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-4: chos rnams 'pro ba'i tshogs rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-5: rang bzhin brjod bral rtog pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-6: rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-7: srid gsum ye nas rnam dag chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-8: bdag rtog 'khrul pa'i nyes dmigs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-10: rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-11: log pa'i sems kyis kun brtags kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-12: rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-13: ye nas don gyis sangs rgyas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-15: log rtog dngos med byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-16: 'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-17: tha ba'i gnas nyid byang chub zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-18: srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-19: 'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-20: brtan g-yo dngos po thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-21: bde chen sku las gzhan med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-23: de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-24: bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-25: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-26: de nas gsang ba'i bdag po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130a-28: mtshan nyid 'phro zhing rtogs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-0: rgyal bas bshad phyir bskul 'debs @130b mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-1: bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-2: dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-3: rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-4: rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-5: rab rgyas mtshan bzhin cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-6: yan lag dag la bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-7: de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-8: gnyis med ye shes la 'gro ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-9: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-10: rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-11: stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-12: ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-13: dbyangs kyi yi ge'i tshul 'jug pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-14: rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-15: skar ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-16: mnyam nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-17: snang ba'i 'od zer lnga yi tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-18: phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-19: rnam 'phros rang rig zhing khams sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-20: de dag gong bu'i gzugs mtshungs par; ;gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-21: stong nyid snying rje chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-22: ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-23: nam mkha' dang pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-24: thugs rje chen po skyon skyong mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-25: sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-26: mkha' snang gsal ba kun khyab las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-27: sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-29: kun 'phrul sa bon las bskyed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-30: ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-31: shar du do shal phreng pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-32: gdugs dang rgyal mtshon rnga yab sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:130b-33: me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-1: lo rin chen rdo rje pad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-2: tva ra na bzhi rgyan mjes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-3: sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-4: tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-6: rin chen 'bar ba'i khri brtsegs gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-7: nyi zla padma'i rin chen rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-8: gnas rnams khyab par ji bzhin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-25: de bzhin nyid dbyings rmad byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-26: bder gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-27: byin rlabs ya mtshan sprul pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-28: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kun gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-29: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-30: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-31: phung po chos rnams sangs rgyas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-32: 'byung lnga dbyings phyug yum gyi mkha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-33: khams dang skye mched sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-34: sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-35: phyi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-36: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-37: gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-38: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-39: 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-40: 'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-41: rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-42: thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-43: sa khams sangs rgyas spyan yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-44: chu khams lha mo m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131a-45: me khams na bza' dkar mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-0: @131b rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-1: nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-3: dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-4: thams cad bder gshegs rigs kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-5: mig la rnam par snang mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-6: rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-7: sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-8: lce la don yod grub pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-9: lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-10: de ltar snang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-11: ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-12: rnal 'byor gsang ba don shes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-13: phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-14: yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-15: gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-16: sgra tshogs lha mo m'a mak'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-17: dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-18: ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-19: reg tshogs lha mo kun du bzang mo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-21: rdo rje padmo mnyam sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-22: rang rig dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-23: thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-24: yon tan 'phrin las rol pa'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-26: thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-27: sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-28: rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-29: yon tan 'phrin las mtha' phyin pas; ;tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-30: rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-31: rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-32: rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:131b-33: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-0: @132a *// dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-1: 'gro rnams tshogs bcas dag par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-2: rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-3: rdo rje mgon po'i sgo gsal brtan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-4: rtag tu gtor sbyin btang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-5: khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-6: rtag tu lha la mchod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-7: rang gi 'dud rtsis mchod cing rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-8: rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-9: rnam grol thams cad brag ca'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-10: pha rol phyin bcu dus gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-12: zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-13: padma'i rigs kun mnyam par sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-14: padma'i dam tshig la gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-16: padma rang gi gnas su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-17: 'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-18: mgon po rang rang gnas la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-19: dri med dag pa'i thig le las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-20: 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-21: rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-22: de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-23: kun du padma chags med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-25: thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-26: dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-27: yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-28: kun du dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog ;rdo rje'i dam tshig la gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-29: rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132a-31: ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-0: thugs rjes rnam mang @132b yul bral zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-1: 'joms par mdzad pa khro bo'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-2: rang gi dkyil 'khor dri bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-3: mngon sum gsang ba'i ye shes sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-4: 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-5: 'khor lo rang yi gnas su bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-6: rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-8: phung po khams rnams rnam dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-9: 'phrin las ye shes bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-10: byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas; ;dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-11: dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-12: phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-15: ces gsungs pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-18: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-19: kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-20: sangs rgyas tshogs rnams skyed pa'i yab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-21: khyed kyis dkyil 'khor sprul mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-22: gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-23: phyi yi 'gro ba ci ltar gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-24: gang dag dbang po ma smin pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:132b-25: dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-0: @133a *// de dag thugs rje chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-1: bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-8: ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug par 'dod bdag gis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-9: rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-10: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-11: dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-12: bdag chos ma lus shas gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-13: skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-14: byang sems snying rje chen po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-15: dga' ba btang snyoms bzhi bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-16: sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-17: slar nyid byang chub lam la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-18: pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-19: bsdu ba bzhi la legs gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-20: theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-21: nyan thos la sogs blos pa med pa'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-22: gsang ba'i theg pa don gnyer zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-23: dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-24: gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-25: de nyid bcu la goms gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-26: rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-27: dngos po de nyid brtan par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-28: mu stegs la sogs mi bskyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-29: theg dman la sogs 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133a-30: rtag tu 'gro ba gzung ba'i blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-0: @133b dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-1: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-2: grong khyer chen por 'gro byed dpon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-3: 'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-4: btang snyoms spong len med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-5: nyid; ;dmus long tshogs kyi dmig bu bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-6: bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-7: 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-8: zhi des gsong por smra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-10: 'ong pa; ;rtse gcig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-11: blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-12: lha dang bla ma la sogs gus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-13: theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-14: ngan pa'i chogs spangs gzhan du gnas; ;de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-15: theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-16: sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-17: ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-18: me tog chu rgyun phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-19: gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-21: bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-22: bsnyen pa ji bzhin rdzogs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-23: dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-24: phun sum tshogs pa bdun ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-25: bdag gnas sa gzhi'i grogs bcas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-26: mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-27: bsrung zhing byin gyis brlab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-28: rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-29: gur dang bla re bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-30: khro bo me 'od mtshon cha'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:133b-31: bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-2: bsod nams tshogs kyis dag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-3: phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-4: sdig bshags bsod nams rjes yi rang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-5: sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-6: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-7: lus dbul byang sems bskyed pa dang //
