K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-8: lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-9: rgya cher yongs su bsngo byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-10: sems can don du smon lam gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-11: dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-12: de dag brtson bral nam mkha' bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-13: rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-14: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-15: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-16: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-18: don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-19: de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-20: dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-21: rigs kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-23: sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-24: grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-25: ri phug nags tshal gang rung bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-26: nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-27: gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-28: ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-29: dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-30: de ni rab gus brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-31: nam mkha' 'khor lo dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-32: sa gzhi padma dra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-33: bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134a-34: bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-0: sa gzhi zhos rdib @134b med pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-1: dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-2: shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-4: lho dang nub tu gzhol pas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-6: nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-8: gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-9: dbus su dma' ba spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-10: sa de pus mo nub tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-11: brkos te slar yang dgang par bya; ;med 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-12: gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-13: dma' zhing ma legs gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-14: sol dum rus sogs byung na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-15: yang na chu yis dgang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-16: slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-17: mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-18: shar du mi drag gom pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-19: song ste slar log blta bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-21: snang dang mi snad sa yi bdag ;mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-22: blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-23: bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-24: bar chad med pa'i sa dbus na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-25: rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-26: chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-28: 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-29: mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin brlabs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-30: rdo rje bsrung pa'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-31: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-32: sa yi lha mo srung ma rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-33: spyan drangs mchod pas mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:134b-34: khyad par sa yi bdag po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-2: dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-3: dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-4: sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-5: gang zhig dngos grub la sogs 'dod; ;rab 'bring tha ma grub don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-6: lto 'phye brtag pa'i cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-7: yan lag kun dbang rgya yang bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-9: sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-10: brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-11: sa zhag mdog bzang 'jam phyen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-12: gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-13: sngags btab gang zhig 'thas par bcag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-14: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor bstod; ;rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-15: tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-16: mtha' skor khru gang pa yi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-17: dbang bskur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-18: ji ltar gru bzhi rgyar bskyed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-19: dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-20: tshad mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-21: rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-22: snying po lnga dang 'bru lnga dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-23: dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-24: dkyil 'khor snying por gzhag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-25: phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-26: stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-27: dri zhim sngags kyis byin brlabs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-28: chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-29: sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-30: lha tshogs mgron rnams tshim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-31: slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135a-32: rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-0: @135b sgrub pa'i grogs mchog blo gros ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-1: tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-2: dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-3: kun 'byung nam mkha' dag pa'i sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-4: brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-5: dkyil 'khor ri brtsegs bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-6: rdo rje bsdams pa sar bzhag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-7: byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-8: rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-9: phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar rgyan; ;rdo rje sa gzhi ra ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-10: gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-11: gtso bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-12: bad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-14: lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-15: me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-16: lus phyed sa las thon byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-17: mthun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-18: mchod bstod zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing; ;dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-19: de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-20: bdud sogs bsgo ba'i dag bcas mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-21: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-22: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-23: sa dang pha rol phyin pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-24: lha mo khyod ni dpang du shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-25: ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-26: bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-27: de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-28: rgyal bar byas pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-29: de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-30: rdo rje dril 'gying bcas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:135b-31: dam tshig nye bar bskul ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-2: rgyal bas 'gro ba'i mgon gyur pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-3: chos kyi me long gsal ba ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-4: bder gshegs rnams kyi gsang ba pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-5: rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-6: ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-7: sgrib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-8: rdo rje padmo mnyam pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po drug cu'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-10: theg chen chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-11: gsang gsum padmo dag pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-12: so sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-13: rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-14: zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-15: chos kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-16: rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-17: rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-18: nyams dga' thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-19: bdag med mnyam pa'i ye shes can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-20: 'phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-21: gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-22: rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-23: spyan bzang dag pas 'gro la gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-24: slar nyid khro bo chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-25: zhal lnga phyag cha sna tshogs 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-27: mgur nas h'um bsgoms sgra sgrog cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-28: rdo rje padma lta ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-29: lha rnams bdag la bsdu byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-30: ma dang ta las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-31: mig gnyis nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-32: 'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136a-33: slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-0: shangs @136b kyi rlung sgo 'bar ba nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-2: rdo rje'i 'gros las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-3: sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-6: grihna pa ya grihna pa ya h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-7: aa na ya ho bha ga w'a na bidya ra dza ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-8: phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-9: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-11: h'um/ lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-12: gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-13: sha za gshin rje ma mo'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-14: mkha' 'gro gnod sbyin ma lus rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-15: gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-16: srung byed sa yi bdag por bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-17: thos pa tsam gyis myur bar dengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-18: nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-19: gang zhig gnas pa'i mthu bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-20: padma rdo rje kha tv'am kha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-21: thal ba'i tshogs bzhin rlag par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-24: gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-25: 'dod gsum skye gnas gsal byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-27: sa las yongs su bskor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-28: bgegs byed bya phyir phur par gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-29: aom gha ta ya gha ta ya sarba dushtan phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-30: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha rod aadzny'a pa ya ti ksha ya w'a ka tsitta badzra k'i la ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-31: lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-32: ngo mtshar khro bo'i zur mig bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-33: smin ma khro gnyer g-yon mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-35: so so'i phyag rgya gnas su sgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:136b-36: 'gying bag bcas pas zhal la bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-2: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-3: ba yi rnam lnga dri bsres chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-4: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi nyer byugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-5: lha rnams gnas su dri yi chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-6: thig le gru bzhi zlum por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-7: rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-8: so so'i gnas su dgram par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-9: dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-10: lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-11: dkyil 'khor lha rnams nye ba'i sa; ;mchod cing bstod pas mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-12: cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-13: bzod gsol bskang pa'i don ched du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-14: rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-15: phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba bya; ;aom badzra satva sa ma ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-17: badzra stva tve no pa tishtha di dho me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-18: su po shyo me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-19: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-20: su to shyo me bha ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-23: tsittam shr'i yam ku ru h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-26: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ma me munytsa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-27: badzri bha ba mah'a sa ma ya stva aa:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-28: gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-29: lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-30: sdig pa ma lus zad byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-31: las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-32: pus mo sa la btsugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-33: lag pa g-yas pa spos 'dzin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-34: g-yon pa dril bu dkrol byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-35: tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-36: aom bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137a-37: mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-0: @137b rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-1: brnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-2: dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-3: tshul khrims la sogs phung po mnyes gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-4: padma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-5: dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-6: mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams kun las rnam grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-7: bde gshegs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-8: 'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs sgrub dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-9: 'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes gzung byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-10: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-11: dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen brtson lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-12: mgon po'i bka' drin rjes su brtse dgongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-13: khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad 'os lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-14: me tog dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-15: ji srid 'gro ba'i don rnams ma grub par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-16: de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-17: bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-18: de nas slob ma la bos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-19: kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-20: rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung 'di nyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-21: dad gus dga' ba'i shugs phyung shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-22: sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-23: cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-24: mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-25: ma byon de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-26: de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:137b-27: 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-3: skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-4: kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-5: gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-7: bdud tshogs shin tu mi bzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-8: dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-9: de phyir kun mkhyen ye shes kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-10: blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-11: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-12: kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-14: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-15: 'khor lo bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-16: kun nas skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-17: dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid tshe //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-19: khyad par du yang slob dpon la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-20: khyod kyis skyabs su 'gro bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-21: de nas legs spyod slob ma yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-22: skyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-23: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-24: dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-25: bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-26: bgyid pa rjes su yi rang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-27: mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-28: de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-29: rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-30: rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-31: bsgom bzlas la sogs bsod nams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-32: dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138a-33: sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-0: chos kyi 'khor lo @138b bskor byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-1: tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-2: bdag ni rab tu skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-3: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-4: skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-5: byang chub sems mchog dri med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-6: 'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-7: dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-8: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-9: de bzhin nyid dbyings byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-10: dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-11: rdo rje slob dpon la gus shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-12: dus kun du ni yon tan gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-13: rnal 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-14: rdo rje spun la mig bzhin blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-15: gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-16: brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-17: de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-18: rang dang mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-19: byin brlabs ye shes bskyed par bya; ;slar yang bdug pa me tog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-20: mar me dri chab la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-21: rang gi gnas su 'dug cing dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-22: bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-23: lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-24: rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-25: chag gas med pa'i tshems shing ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-26: sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzang byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-27: rtse mo me tog phreng btags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-28: sngags zlos dri chus bsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-29: rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-30: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra shi ta ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-31: yi ge gsum bcas sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-32: shar du kha bltas slob ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:138b-33: bden pa bdar zhing sbyin bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-0: @139a *// des kyang mi smra blang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-1: gri rtse lta bus lce bzhar zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-2: phra mo'i phyogs kyis so brus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-3: sa gzhi dri yis byugs pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-4: phan tshun mi blta dor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-5: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-6: zhi sogs dngos grub mtshan ma brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-7: gyen thur rab dang 'bring gis blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-9: las dag pa yi sngags bzlas nas; ;sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-10: chu gtsang dris sbyang khyor ba gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-11: nye reg 'thor ba'i tshul du sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-12: aom hri bi shuddha sarba dharma p'a pa ni ts'a sha bi sho dha ma sarba kalpa na aa pa ni ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-13: gtsang ma'i ras la legs bkal ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-14: srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-15: yi ge gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-16: de yi dpung pa g-yon par bcing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-17: ku sha rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-18: bam po gnyis su sbams pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-19: yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-20: sngas dang stan du sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-21: aom sarba du sti ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-22: dga' ba'i gtam gyis gzengs bstod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-23: mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-24: lha tshogs rnams la bsngo byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-25: bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-26: mi smra dge pa'i sems bcas pas; ;rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-27: slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139a-29: lha rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-0: dge ba'i sems @139b kyis nyal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-1: de nas skya rengs shar dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-2: slob dpon slob ma sngas 'ongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-3: kye kye bzhin bzang rnams longs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-4: rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-5: bden pa brjod pa'i dus yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-6: des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-7: rab 'bring mtshan ma'i ltas bstan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-8: ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-9: sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-10: ba yi rnam lngas byug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-11: dngos rnams mtshan ma las grol ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-12: stong pa chen po ye shes bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-13: rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-14: bum pa mgul ring lto ba zlum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-15: kha khyer zhabs bteg 'phel ka che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-16: dri zhim tshon dkar legs byugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-18: so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-19: rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-20: mchod nas stan la bkram par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-21: rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-22: snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-23: bkra shis rdzas lnga gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-24: mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-25: dam tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-26: ye shes sku dang gnyis med par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-27: mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-28: sngags bcas chu dang gnyis med gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-29: dkyil 'khor grub pa'i dus dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-30: rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-31: dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:139b-32: ye shes lha dang gnyis med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-1: pas; ;dkyil 'khor sa la thig gdab bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-2: shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-3: ji bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-4: dkyil 'khor sgrub pa gnas bya'o; ;gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-5: kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-6: lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-7: byin gyis brlabs cing bsgril bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-8: stong pa nyid kyis sbyangs byas nas; ;rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-9: mchod bstod sngags bcas bsgril bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-10: aom badzra sa ma ya mu tra ma ti kra ma h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-12: dza gdags pa yi sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-13: rdo rje slob dpon thugs ka nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-14: slob mas smin mtshams drang por 'then //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-15: de la gnas kyi nub dang shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-17: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon bar blta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-18: rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-19: dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-20: stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-21: rdo rje thig skud sgrar ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-22: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor legs grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-23: 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-24: aom aa nu na aa nu ga to sarba dharma pa ra pa ra aa nu ga ta sarba aa nanta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-25: aa ba ta ra sarba dharma h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-26: lha rnams mdun du bzhugs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-27: mchod bstod dbang po'i tshul du dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-28: rdo rje khu tshur sar bzhag cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-29: shar nas nub tu brkyang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140a-30: tshangs thig dang po gdab byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-0: @140b de bzhin sgo nas tshad kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-1: zur bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-2: rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-3: mtshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-4: legs thig gru bzhi mnyam gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-5: brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu bgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-6: bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-7: gzhan dag cha phran bzhi bzhir bgo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-8: thig gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-9: ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-10: rdo rje khu tshur sngags bcas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-11: rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-13: dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-14: mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-15: dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-16: sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-17: sgo dag bzhi po dbye byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-18: cha phran dag kyang blo yis brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-19: rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-20: ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs byas te; ;'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-21: rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-22: aom be g'a kra ma h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-23: padma rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-25: thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-26: khyab mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-27: rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-28: yon tan 'phrin las rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-29: ma lus sems can don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-30: pho brang dag par byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-31: phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-32: byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:140b-33: nyon mongs nyes tshogs kun bcom pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-0: thugs rje chen po dri med @141a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-1: shugs; ;ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-2: dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-3: rin chen rnam lnga'i phye ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-4: sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-5: rin po che yi snod blugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-6: dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-7: sbyangs shing byin gyis brlabs byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-8: rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-9: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-10: mchod bstod sngags kyis mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-11: aom badzra tsitta ma ti sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-12: dkar mthing ser po ljang khu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-13: dmar po'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-14: dbang ldan mtshams nas brtsam byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-15: panytsa r'a ga drang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-16: g-yas pas padma rdo rje gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-18: de la mchod 'bul sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-19: bden pa bdar te dgab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-20: 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-21: sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-22: dpal ldan padma gar dbang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-24: yang dag bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-25: dkyil 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-26: dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-27: dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-28: phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-29: mtho dman med snyoms drang por bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-30: de nas mtshan ma rtags bstan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-31: chad cing smra bas mi 'grub ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-32: yon pas gdung ba'i las rnams skye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-33: chad pas slob dpon slob ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141a-34: shi tha ma ngan par 'gyur ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-0: lhag @141b dang bcas pas g-yul 'khrugs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-2: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-3: re'u mig nyi shu rtsa lnga las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-4: bde gshegs gtso bo'i rigs su bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-5: phyag rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-7: nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshogs rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-8: byang sems khro bo bcas pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-9: shar nas rim bzhin bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-10: phyi dang nang gi mtshams rnams su; ;mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-11: bar khyams bskal bzang sems dpa' rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-12: sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshogs gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-13: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-14: bde gshegs 'od zer snang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-15: padmo rdo rje dril bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-16: rang gi kha dog tshon bcas gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-17: de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-18: tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-19: chags med 'od dang spyan dga' pa'i; ;pad brtsegs padma'i phreng ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-20: bdag nas glegs bam rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-21: rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-22: shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-23: bde bar gshegs pa mi bskyod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-24: rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-25: rang gi 'od bcas gdan la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-26: de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-27: 'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-28: mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-29: chags shing rin chen pad spungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-30: rin po che yi dra ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-31: rim bzhin rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-32: lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:141b-33: bde gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-2: rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-3: de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-4: nam mkha'i mdzod dang dra ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-5: dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-6: rin chen gling bu rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-7: rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-8: rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-9: nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-10: bde gshegs kun du snang ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-11: 'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-12: rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan ba bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-14: byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-15: bde gshegs don yod grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-16: rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-17: rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-18: de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-19: brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-20: gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-21: rgya gram phreng dang padma phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-22: rdo rje gdengs po zla gam can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-24: mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-26: padma gnon dang pad skyong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-27: me long rin chen phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-28: pi wang gar gyi phyag rgya la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-29: rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-30: phyi rol padma'i shar brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-31: rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-32: bde ba'i blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-33: gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-34: nam mkha'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-35: pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142a-36: rang 'od sngags kyi mtshan mar gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-0: shes rab snang @142b pa rdo rje rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-2: rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-4: dri ma'i tshogs dang sgyu ma 'phrul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-5: rin chen rgyal po dra ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-6: rin chen ri bo rgya gram bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-7: lag pa brang gser 'od 'phro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-8: rin chen snye ma chos mthong dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-9: padma'i rgya gram glegs bam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-10: padma'i sdong po'i go cha bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-11: dri med mun pa sel ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-12: dga' ba dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-13: chu shel nor bu'i phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-14: sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-15: de ni rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-16: rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-17: de mthar khro bo bzhi rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-18: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-19: sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-20: rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-21: dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-22: gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-23: bdug spos me tog mar me dri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-24: phyi rol bar khyams gnas dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-25: phyogs re sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-26: rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-27: blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-28: rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-29: rang 'od gnas gdan dag la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-30: padmo dga' ba'i sa la dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-31: rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-32: rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-33: rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-34: yid 'ong me tog sgron ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-35: spos brtsegs kha lo sgyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-36: padma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-37: rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-38: dran dbang padma'i blo gros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:142b-39: las byed snying po'i blo gros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-2: rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-3: shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-4: khro bo'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-5: rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-6: rin chen dbyug pa padma phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-7: rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-8: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-9: phyogs bzhi rgyan dang phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-10: 'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-11: rgyan rnams padma rdo rje dang; ;rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-12: 'phro bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-13: nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od bcas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-14: phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-15: bandha dril bu nyi shu bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-16: gdugs dang bum pa bya yi phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-17: dpag bsam rdzing bu dang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-18: nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-19: chos kyi 'khor lo ri dvags rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-20: mdzes byas phyi mtha' padma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-21: rdo rje me 'od mtshon gyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-22: dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-23: pad phreng dmar po bar khyams dkar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-24: sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-25: gru chad gser gyi kha dog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-26: mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-27: bla rgyan na bza' phyogs rgyan bre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-28: me tog tshom bu sngags bcas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-29: so so'i gnas su dgram par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-30: gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-31: phyi rol phyogs dang mtshams su dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-32: lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-34: de nas lha rnams bstod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-35: rdo rjes padmo dam tshig gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143a-36: thugs ka'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-0: mgron rnams @143b tshim par 'gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-1: dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-2: rang gi 'phrin las bcol bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-5: gzugs brnyan brtsam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-7: rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-8: rgyal ba sar yang bskul ba mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-9: kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-10: ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-12: dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-13: de bzhin rab tu gnas pa gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-14: bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-15: sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-16: gtso bo thugs rje cher ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-17: ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-18: dus 'di snang bar mdzad nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-19: cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-20: de nas byang chub sems tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-21: gus bar gzung ste spyad par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-23: phyag rgya shes rab rab bskyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-24: rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-25: rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-26: mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-27: don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-28: byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-29: ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-30: gnyis med gsang ba'i thig pa 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:143b-32: gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-2: yang dang yang du gsol btab ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-3: dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i don du gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-4: ma lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-5: byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-6: phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-7: thams cad byang chub don du bsngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-9: chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-10: ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-11: de ring yid 'ong don chen gnyer //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-12: aom au ta ga ta sa ma ya stvam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-13: padma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-15: mtshan dpe phun sum tshogs pa yi; ;bde gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-16: rdo rje chen pos gzhan rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-17: mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-18: thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar phyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-19: rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-20: gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-22: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-23: rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-24: yon tan rin chen char 'bebs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-26: dpal mchog bkra shis phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-27: theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-28: kun tu gnas 'gyur khyab pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-29: las mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-30: mi mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144a-32: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-0: dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas @144b nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-1: dbang bskur gsang ba las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-2: dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-3: shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-4: rjes su 'jug pas snying rje'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-5: yang dag bden pa las byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-6: byin rlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-7: bde gshegs sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-8: dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-9: me tog phreng ba la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-10: slob ma brgyan bar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-11: phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-12: gtor ma phyogs kun las phyin nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-13: kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-14: slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-15: ras gtsang dmar bo'i rgyu las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-16: gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-17: rang gi sngags kyis byin brlabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-18: legs par gdong ni g-yogs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-19: padmo'i thal sbyar rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-20: sngags brjod gzungs 'dzin rtse gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-21: brtan bor byang chub don gnyer bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-22: dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-23: de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-24: theg chen lam la zhugs pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-25: slob ma dag la slar smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-26: gsang sngags lam mchog zab pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-27: shin tu gzung bar dka' ba yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-28: khyod kyis gzung bar 'dod pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-29: mi snyems pa yi blo bskyed nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-30: lta spyod mchog la gnas dgongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-31: kye ma rdo rje gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-32: theg chen snying po bla ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:144b-34: rmongs rnams the tshom skye bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-1: pas; ;dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-2: byin rlabs ngo mtshar mchog brnyes te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-3: sems can don phyir tshul dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-4: khyod kyis sgro skur dang bral zhing; ;dad brtson the tshom med par zungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-5: de nas slob mas slar gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-6: yang dag thugs rje cher mnga' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-7: mgon mchog rnams kyis bdag la gnong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-8: 'di dag bdag la gtol med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-9: khyod kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-10: slar yang rab gus dang ba'i yid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-11: tshul chen mi nyan dam tshig mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-12: slob dpon che la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-13: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sras bcas tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-14: thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-15: bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-16: dkyil 'khor gnas su mos pa bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-17: gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-18: mgon 'gyur rnams la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-20: bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-21: de nas las kyi rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-22: gsang ba'i mthe bo nas bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-23: yol ba'i nang du gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-24: aom padmo sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsitta autpa t'a y'a mi h'um sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-25: de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-26: mchod brnyes rgyun bshags la sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-27: snod du rung bar gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-28: dam tshig gsum sgrog chu blud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145a-29: rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-0: phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas @145b gsum sbyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-2: aom/ rgyal ba kun gyis khyod nyid ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-3: byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-5: bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-6: dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-7: blo dman shes rab chung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-8: blo dman rtog 'dzin la gnas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-9: srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-10: bde chen mgon po pad 'chang sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-11: khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-12: gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-13: snying khrag 'thung zhing gzhan du shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-14: bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-15: khyod la thugs rjes gzung byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-16: nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-17: 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-18: bdag la brnyas shing 'khu byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-19: rab gtum khro bo chen po'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-20: klad pa tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-21: lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-22: gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la; ;rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-23: dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-24: dri zhim bdug spos dril bkrol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-25: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-26: des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-27: sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-28: gsung gi ye shes gsang ba brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-29: thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-30: sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas; ;bden pa'i ye shes byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-31: dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-32: bdag gis skal ba ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:145b-33: dus 'dir dbab par mdzad pa rigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-2: rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-3: sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-4: slar nyid de la sbyin par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-5: gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas; ;ma rig ldongs pa'i ling tog bsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-6: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-7: khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-8: ma rig bsgribs g-yogs bsal mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-9: padmo spyan bzang dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-10: aom padma tsakshu dzny'a na pra be sha phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-11: rdo rjes gdong g-yogs bsal byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-12: dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-13: legs par ltos shig blo gros che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-16: legs par zhugs te grub pa bzhin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-18: shar gyi sgo srung nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-19: gtso bo'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-20: zhal zas na bza' la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-21: bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-22: yi dam lha sku phyag rgya sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-23: gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-24: de ring dus nas bzung byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-26: rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-27: dus kun tu ni gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-28: kye ma ho blo gros rgya mtsho'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-29: 'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146a-30: khyod zhabs padma la btud de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-3: rigs bzhin thugs rje brtse dgongs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-4: dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-5: gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-6: skyob pa'i sku mchog thob par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-7: shar gyi sgo phyogs khru do'i rgyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-8: dbang bstan dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-10: dmar po'i tshon gyis legs byugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-12: 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-14: dung dang zangs dung sil snyan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-15: rol cha mchod cha phyogs mtshams dgod //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-17: dri chu sngags bcas yungs kar dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-18: ku sha'i chu yis dag par bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-20: de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-21: bkra shis dag pa'i glu blangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-22: rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-23: bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-24: de yi phyir ni sgrib tshogs dang; ;bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-25: lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-26: ye shes phung po dbang phyug mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-27: aom lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-28: rdo rje gsang gsum gnas las byung; ;byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-29: dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-30: yon tan rin chen rnam dag mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:146b-31: rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-5: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-6: khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-7: mtshan dang dpe byad kun rdzob kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-8: ye nas rdo rje rtse lnga pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-9: 'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-10: rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-11: bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-12: khams gsum gnas rnams dor mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-13: byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-15: sgra brjod dngos po brag ca bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-16: stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-17: de las sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-19: hom/ chos kun rgyun las rnam grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-20: de bzhin rkyen med 'bras bu'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-21: rang bzhin padma dag pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-22: nges pa'i theg pa ston byed gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-23: kye ho rdo rje che ge mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-24: rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-25: chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-26: padma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-29: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-30: mi mthun la sogs bcom byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-31: rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147a-33: aom ratna mu ku ta aa bhi shinytsa h'um/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-12: bdud rtsi lnga po sha sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-13: mnyam par shes pas rgyun du spyad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-15: nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon lnga //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-17: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya che //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-19: lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-20: cho ga bzang po spyad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-21: des ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-23: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:147b-24: yang dag sngags kyis byin brlabs te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-3: dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-5: dbye rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-6: gsang pa la sogs las rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-8: khyod kyis gang 'dod grub par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-9: de nas rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-12: phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-13: pha rol phyin drug gnas 'phags te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-15: lung bstan bde gshegs sras bcas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-16: rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-17: rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-18: khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-20: khams gsum kun na gzhan med de //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-22: khyed kyis nam yang ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-23: aom mah'a sa ma ya h'um phat/

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148a-26: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148b-5: mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:148b-9: de nas lha dang bzhugs gnas pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149a-3: dbab pa'i phyag rgya las byung ba'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149a-7: aa ho re ti tshim par mdzad //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149a-11: rang bzhin bde ba'i ye shes nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149a-12: zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149a-13: rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyis ni //
