K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-4: rtse mo cha las sor bzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-5: sor brgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-6: sbams pa'i so so'i mar gyis byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-7: rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-8: zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-9: gru gsum tshul du brtsig par bya; ;lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-10: me yi gnas su bzhag byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-11: so so'i las dang mthun pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-13: g-yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g-yob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-14: g-yon pa bgrang phreng gzung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-15: aom ae hye hi aagne ye mah'a pa ba hi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-16: khro bo'i rgyal pos gsung bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-17: me lha'i gdan mchod padma dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-18: de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-19: bsreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-20: lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag tshang du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-21: bstod cing gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-22: g-yas g-yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-23: khu bcud 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-24: aom mah'a aa na la mah'a bhu t'a badzra la basmi ku ru h'um sarba dushtan h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-26: aom mah'a ku ru panytsa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-27: dgang blugs dbul ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-28: aom sarba ba dha ha na badzra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-32: aom sarba aagne ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:149b-34: aom badzra p'u dza me gha ga lo ke shva ra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-0: @150a *// 'jig rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-1: aom dhu pe ti pa pu sha gandhe sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-2: aom aa pra ti badzra ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-4: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-6: gzhan yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-7: rang ming yi ge gsum sngags dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-9: 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-10: sdig bshags bag chags kun byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-11: lha yi dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-12: tha ma me lha mchod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-13: 'phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing; ;aom badzra na ma sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya ma ku ru h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-14: lha rnams gshegs su gsol zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-15: dam tshig lha la bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-16: de nas rab gnas bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-17: 'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-18: sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes pa ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-19: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor legs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-20: mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-21: slob dpon chas su gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-22: dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrubs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-23: rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-24: ji ltar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-25: dga' ldan gnas nas gshegs mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-26: lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-27: de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150a-28: dkon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-0: @150b me tog la sogs mchod bzhes la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-1: 'di don gzung bar bya ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-2: byang chub sems mchog spel bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-3: nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-4: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-5: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-6: bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-7: bka' drin cho ga mdzad par 'os //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-8: de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-9: 'gro drug gnas kun sgrol byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-10: thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-11: byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-12: gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-13: 'jig rten mchod pa'i don phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-14: rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-15: de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-16: byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-17: rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-18: dbang bskur cho ga rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-19: sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-22: lam khyad par du 'phags pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-23: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i tshe bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-24: kye ma'o ho sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing brlag par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:150b-25: thabs ji lta bus gdul bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-2: bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-3: shin tu dman par gyur pa dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-4: de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-5: srid pa mi bsreg brlag par bya ba'i 'phrin las yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-6: thams cad la bka' bsgo zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-7: las ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-8: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-9: dbang dang gzi brjid thams cad 'dus nas kye khyed rnams bdag la nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-11: rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-12: thams cad srid pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-13: des na phyogs thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-14: bdag gi bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-15: de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshogs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-16: khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can zhig yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-17: nged rnams re re yang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-18: yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-19: gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151a-20: khyod rang bzhin gnas na legs so zhes mthun par brjod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-0: bdud kyi rgyal po yang shin tu nyon mongs @151b pas rgyas te gzhan dag la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-2: nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-3: skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-4: rgyal po'i bka' gsang nyan par gyis; ;khams gsum bdag po lha yi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-5: sa rnams kun gyi sa ster pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-6: bdag ni mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-7: kun gyi 'gran par nus ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-8: nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-9: srog srid brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-11: de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te de dag gi dbus nas srin po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro bor gnas nas rang gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-12: mtshon cha'i tshogs spro bar mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-18: gzhon nu gdong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-19: de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam mi khyab par spros te dbang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:151b-21: ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do; ;gser gyi ri la gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-0: sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang @152a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-1: rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-8: gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-17: chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g-yog 'khor rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-19: de bzhin du khams gsum gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-22: 'gro ba drug gtso bo dbang che zhing mthu yod pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152a-29: rgyu skar gyi tshogs su bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang rang gi 'khor gyi dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-0: de nas bdud kyi rgyal po yang nyon mongs pa skyes te rang gi 'khor rnams 'du bar mdzad cing rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dag gcig tu ston nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal @152b yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-1: khro mo'i tshogs dang rol pa mdzad pa lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-2: 'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon cha me 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te nam mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser nad dang tshub ma thams cad skyes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-3: des 'jig rten gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-4: 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyi sa phyogs thams cad nas 'khor ba'i me 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas bsad cing gtubs pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-5: so so'i tshogs bred par gyur te rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-6: de nas lha thams cad 'du bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde de dag la gnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-7: so so'i snying po blangs te 'khor tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-10: rgyal po chen po bzhi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-12: gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-13: shar gyi gling phran gnyis su 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-14: 'gro ba rigs drug gi sems can rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-16: dri za dang ma mo rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-17: lho'i gling phran la dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-20: gshin rje dang 'dab bzang dang srin po rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-21: nub kyi gling gi gling phran gnyis la 'god do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:152b-22: gza' dang rgyu skar rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba bla na med @153a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-2: bdud kyi sprul pa bstan pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-3: de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing 'khor thams cad la bka' bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-4: rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-5: yid dang mthun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-6: khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ji ltar bsgo ba'i bka' bzhin nyon la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-7: thar pa'i lam 'di chod la ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-8: kho bos 'jig rten stongs par 'ong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-9: bsam pa rgya chen po med pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-10: gti mug can gyi rang bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-11: byol song lta bu yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-12: bde legs kyi gnas thob pa'i don med pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-13: yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-14: kye 'du shes med pa'i 'gro ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-15: rang gi bde ba spong byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-16: thar pa'i lam gzhan sgrub byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-17: de dag 'khrul pas rang rgyud brlag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-18: nyes 'dod bde legs spong byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-19: rmongs pas 'gro rnams snying re rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-20: re zhig thugs rje skal ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-22: gnas gzhan gong ma thob 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-23: bdag la dad sems gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-24: de dag gis kyang de ltar nyan te rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ji ltar bya ba'i thabs med de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-26: de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153a-27: 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dga' ba'i longs spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-0: @153b dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-1: ji ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-2: bdag yin pas 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-3: gzhan dag yod par bdag gis ma mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-4: da sangs rgyas kyi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-5: byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdu na thabs ji ltar brtsam zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-6: rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dri bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-7: de nas bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-8: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnams la mi dge ba'i ltas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-9: mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi sgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-10: ci 'dod pa rnams la grub par bya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-11: bdag cag la mos pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-12: de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-13: gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-14: kho rang gi gnas de nyid dang bcos pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-15: de'i stong gsum g-yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshogs dang bcas pa sprul nas dkar po'i ris la dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bcom zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-16: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-17: bden pa'i mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:153b-18: de nas rab tu khros te bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus gcig tu gdul bar bya spyod pa la ngan pa'i tshul can g-yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-1: tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskul te thar pa'i lam la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyis 'dul bar bya'o zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-2: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-3: de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-4: mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu spro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-5: rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang rjod par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-6: des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g-yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-7: bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-8: bdud kyi sde dang bcas pa shugs 'byung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-9: de nas bcom ldan bde chen mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-10: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-11: stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzad phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-13: de bzhin nyid las ma g-yos kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-14: thugs rje che dang smon lam mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-15: so so'i las rtog mthun bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-16: sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-17: 'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-18: chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-19: de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-20: nga rgyal phrag dog 'dul don du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-21: mthun byas snang ba sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-22: mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-23: padmo bde gshegs rdo rje don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-24: rin chen rin chen las sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-25: phyag rgya che sogs 'khor los bsgyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-26: ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-27: thabs chen rnam dag padmo'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154a-28: shes rab sprul pa'i mchog gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-0: gar gyi dbang @154b phyug bde ba che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-1: rdo rje lta nyid sprul par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-2: gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-3: sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-4: dag pa'i 'gro ba mthun byas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-5: gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad ldan; ;go byed theg pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-6: zab mo gsang sngags ji bzhin par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-7: rgyal ba bde gshegs phyag rgya'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-8: rab sprul dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-9: la las byang sems rgya chen mchog la lar lam lnga dag par sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-10: la lar pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-11: la lar 'bras bu'i don la sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-12: la lar dga' ldan lha yul 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-13: lhums su zhugs dang bltams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-14: 'jig rten spyod mthun rol rtsed sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-15: gzhan gyi skur spang bya ba bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-16: bcas ka'i can gyi bsam 'phrul ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-17: mthun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-18: dka' thub mdzad dang dga' ba spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-19: rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-20: bdud 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-21: rtse gcig ting 'dzin bskul nas bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-23: chos kyi 'khor lo rim bzhin bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-24: mya ngan 'da' tshul ring bsrel ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-25: zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-26: rang byung dud 'gro'i gzugs sna tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-27: snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-29: bdud dang srin po gzugs sogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-30: 'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:154b-31: rang gi ye shes don bkod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-2: las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-3: de bzhin nyid mthus tshogs chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-4: yang dag lam las rab grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-5: nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-6: rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-7: nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-8: rang gi rigs tshogs bsdu bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-10: khams gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-11: su zhig sprul pa aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-13: rang gi dka' thub bde gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-14: mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-15: gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-16: bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-17: su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-18: gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-19: gzugs mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-20: rang gi sku mdzes bsgyur ba dka'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-21: sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-22: rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-23: sems rtogs bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis; ;ting 'dzin rtse gcig 'gyur ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-24: drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-25: rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-26: de nas bdud dpung dang po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-27: dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-28: rgya byed glu dang dregs byed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-29: rab tu khros te rang gi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-30: ston zhing drag po'i gsang sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155a-31: gtum tshig nga ro 'bod sgrog byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-0: de tshe rgyal po'i byin @155b rlabs mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-2: theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-3: khyad par sgo gsung gsang byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-4: yang dag don la bde bkod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-5: thugs rje chen pos mthun mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-6: 'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-7: dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-8: rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-10: gti mug chen po mun gtibs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-11: nga rgyal ri bo kun du bkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-12: zhe sdang me lce 'bar bsregs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-13: phrag dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-15: dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-16: tshogs rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-17: gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul stobs phyung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-18: rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-20: mi nad mu ge 'khrug pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-24: sa gzhi me 'bar chu bdag byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-25: dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-26: bde lam mtho ris thar lam gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-27: mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-28: 'gro rnams sdug bsngal bskyed byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs khral bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-30: de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-31: 'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:155b-32: gtso bo'i phyogs su 'dud byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-2: mgon po bde ba mnyes byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-3: mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-4: thugs rje che mnga' lha yi lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-5: byams sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-6: gdos bcas thal bar brlag mdzad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-7: thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-9: mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-10: de dag nyon mongs rlabs 'khrug pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-11: rang bzhin thar lam bde bar 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-12: byang chub sems nyid rlan bral lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-13: srid gsum yal bar dor byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-14: thugs rje chen po gang la gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-15: ae ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-16: ae ma ho byang sems padma'i rdzing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-17: ae ma ho brjod bral ku mu ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-18: ae ma ho me tog 'bras bcas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-20: rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-21: dus 'dir dag par ga la mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-22: thugs rje chen po ga la gdags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-23: 'di dag skal ldan gsung ba'i snod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-24: rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-25: da ltar rnam rtog ri bos non //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-26: thabs kyis 'dul bar ma gyur pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-27: shugs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-28: dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156a-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-0: mdzad pa chen po'i le'u @156b ste bcu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-2: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-3: rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-4: rin chen nor bu'i phreng sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-5: bandha dril bu 'dod pa lnga yi tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-6: mchod pa bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-7: kha dog nyi shu rtsa lngas sbras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-8: 'khor lo re'u mig dgu pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-9: seng+ge la sogs gdan khri spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-17: ye shes ma 'dres bde chen gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-18: rnam 'phrul rigs mchog gzungs kyi dam tshig dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-19: khro zhing 'dren pa'i mdangs kyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-20: rigs gnyis lung gis rgyud pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-21: dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-22: ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal gnyis dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-23: bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-24: dbus ma khro 'dzum brjid bag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-26: dril bu rin chen rtse gsum 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-27: rin chen phreng ba'i chun 'phyang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-28: mu tig do shal dpung rgyan spras //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-29: stong g-yogs smad dkris na bza' klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-30: dbu rgyan snyan cha sor gdub tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-31: mtshan bzang dpe byad mdzes par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:156b-32: rigs kyi mchod pas dbu skra sil //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-1: pa; ;phyung nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spros //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-2: h'um phat padmo dhrik dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-3: aom dum drum bhindha dza pra mo ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-4: mdzad pa'i 'phrin las rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-5: slar 'dus bdag po'i sku la thim //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-6: shar du rnam snang phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-7: gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-8: rtse gsum be con padmo ral gri bandha 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-9: lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-10: mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-11: rin chen padma gri gug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-12: sh'u la bum pa rtse gsum 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-13: nub tu snang ba mtha' yas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-14: dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-15: thod dbyug rtse gsum padmo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-17: byang du don yod grub pa nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-18: ljang khu zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-19: ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa mdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-20: padmo rtse gsum gshin rje'i rkang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-21: kun gyi g-yas dkar g-yon pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-22: dmar ljang ser dang le brgan mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-23: rang gi btsun mo'i mgul nas 'khyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-24: zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po lhar; ;sku mdog gsang ba'i mdangs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-25: phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157a-36: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-0: 'khor los bsgyur rgyal cha @157b lugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-1: dgyes pa'i skyil krung tshul gyis bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-2: khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-3: sems dpa' brgyad dang sems ma brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-4: thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-5: rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-6: sa snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-7: nam snying mthing ga ral gri 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-9: gsang bdag ljang skya rdo rje 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-10: g-yon pa padmo yu ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-11: snyems pa'i tshul gyis phyogs su 'dud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-12: sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-14: me long rin chen phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-15: dbyangs snyan gar thabs mdzes pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-17: h'um l'a sye sa ma ya stvam//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-18: tr'am m'a le sa ma ya ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-21: aa nri ti ra ga y'a mi h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-22: byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-23: sgrib sel 'khor lo mthing ga ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-25: kun bzang ljang ser rin chen snga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-27: sems dpa'i stabs kyis gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-28: bdug spos me tog 'thor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-29: mar me dri chab lha mo rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-30: ser dkar dmar ljang go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-31: mtshan dang mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-32: aom me ra ni; dza dh'u be pra be sha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-33: thi ling sva ra ma pa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-34: h'um pushpe a'a be sha h'um sva ra tsa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-35: bam d'i pam bu gi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:157b-37: ho gindhe tsi ta ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-0: shar sgor gshin rje gshed po @158a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-1: che; ;mthing nag po con rtse gsum phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-2: lho sgor stobs chen ser skya'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-3: rdo rje zhags pa rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-4: nub sgor rta mchog 'jigs byed rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-5: thod sprul dril bu lu gu rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-6: byang sgor rdo rje 'khyil ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-7: ljang skya rdo rje rtse gsum mthu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-8: khro bo cha lugs rngam brjid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-9: dur khrod rim pa'i chas kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-10: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-12: rdo rje mche sogs khro gnyer can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-13: yab yum 'khyil ba brkyang bskum sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-14: h'um phat ru lu'i gsung 'don cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-15: las kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-16: aom ru lu padma nta krit h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-17: dza badzra kro dh'i shva ri h'um pradzny'a nta krita phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-18: h'um ratna kro dh'i shva ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-20: bam padma kro dh'i shva ri h'um bigh'anta krit; ho karma kro dh'i shva ri h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-21: phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-22: thugs rje ye shes che las sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-23: phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-24: dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-26: 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-27: tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-28: rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-29: de dag dran pa med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-30: mtshon cha'i tshogs kyis sgrol byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-31: dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158a-32: 'phrin las khro bo brjid glu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-0: lha chen @158b 'khor rnams dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-1: dkyil 'khor chen por bzhag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-2: snga ma'i sha rus gnas nas ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-3: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-4: lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-5: 'khor bcas pa yi dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-6: rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-7: dam tshig gsang ba'i brdas bsgos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-8: 'phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-9: gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-10: kun kyang tshig dbyangs mthun pa bsgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-11: dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-14: rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-15: de nas padmo chags pa'i skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-16: gsung gi gzi mdangs rgyas mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-17: phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-18: gser mig 'dab bzang grong khyer dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-19: langka'i gnas tshogs srin po'i sde //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-20: klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-22: lha chen la sogs gdul bar dgongs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-23: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-24: padma rta mchog sprul pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-25: de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las; ;sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-26: rdo rje 'dzin thub dbang nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-27: rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung las grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:158b-28: sku mdog dmar po r'a ga'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-2: phyag na gri gug kha tv'am ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-3: thod pa khrag me dpung sprul lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-4: gnas brgyad klu bdag thod phreng dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-5: glang chen stag gi pags pa gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-6: sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-7: bgegs la sogs pa'i cha lugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-8: drang srong khros pa'i cha lugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-9: klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-10: padma'i gdan la brkyang bskum gyis; ;yum chen dpal ldan ma dang sbyor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-11: aom padmo gu ru he he ru lu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-13: ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-14: hr'i las grub pa'i 'jigs gzugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-15: rta mgo ljang khu brjid pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-16: shar du padma'i dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-17: dkar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-18: rdo rje padma klu zhags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-19: rin chen dbyug ba ral gri mdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-21: sna tshogs mi mthun zhabs kyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-22: nyi ma zla ba'i snyan chas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-23: sprul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-24: lho ru gzi chen drag po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-25: mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-26: rdo rje rtse gsum mda' dang gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-27: drag po gnas kyi sku dang 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-28: me ri 'bar bas kun tu khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-29: stag mo bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-30: sprul pa'i pho nya me 'brug gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-31: khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-32: nub tu rdo rje dra ba mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159a-33: dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa gri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-0: 'khor lo sbrul zhags @159b me long chu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-1: lha mo 'jigs chen zhabs kyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-3: sprul pa'i pho nya lce spyang gdong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-6: ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-7: nor bu dang khug lcug ma dung khrag 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-8: ra ro mig dmar zil gyis gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-9: rgyal bdag khro bo'i sku dang 'khril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-10: cod pan klu mgo gdengs ka'i rgyan /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-11: dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-12: kun kyang thod phreng g-yang gzhi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-13: dur khrod gnas 'byung gtsang sme byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-14: mtshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-15: rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-16: zhal gsum phyag drug 'od mdangs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-17: rdo rje thod dbyug klu yi sgra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-18: lce spyang bya khyung gnam lcags sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-19: 'od phreng thig le dbyug gu'i rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-20: rnam 'phrul klu thabs au ha ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-21: 'dod yon lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-22: kun tu spyan dmar rdo rje'i mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-23: gnas su 'jigs pa'i h'um sgra sgrogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-24: klu yi rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-26: aom mah'a ha ya gr'i ba padma dha ru nam bidha har h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-28: aom na mo aud tam he ru lu ru kam pa mu kha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-29: a'a ka rsha ya raksha na gam gu ru h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-31: aom padma rakma ku rya ra gam ru lu ru lu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-33: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:159b-34: lcags kyu lcags sgrog zhags pa dril bu rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-2: mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-3: rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-4: 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-6: klu chen brgyad sogs bdus byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-7: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-8: rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-9: spyan rnams spyan sngar 'dod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-10: aom na ga drings me ganan gar dza ya sa ma ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-11: dkyil 'khor gsang bar dbang bskur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-13: rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsal byed phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-14: ye shes 'od tshogs gnas bcas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-15: dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms zhugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-16: tshul 'dzin dkon mchog mngon du dbye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-17: tshogs rnams ma lus mgrin gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-18: gar dbang sku la skyabs gsol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-20: bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-21: kye ma dkyil 'khor ya mtshan che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-22: bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad; ;rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-23: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-24: bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-25: da ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-27: ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-28: rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160a-29: gal te nyams na 'das par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-0: de @160b bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-1: rta mgrin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-2: de nas bcom ldan padma'i skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-3: yul la chags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-4: bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-5: mi shigs ting 'dzin la gnas mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-6: phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-7: rang gi chung ma tshogs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-8: gnas gzhan 'jigs par mdzad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-9: rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-10: sku ni bee d'ur 'tsher ba'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-11: zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gis rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-12: rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-13: 'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-14: rgyan dang cha lugs rin chen tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-15: dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-16: dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor; ;'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug pa'i 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-17: rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan rin chen phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-18: phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-19: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-20: gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-22: padma'i lte bar skyil krung bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-23: shar du 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-24: dkar gsal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-25: lho ru rin chen blo gros sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-26: dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-27: nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-29: byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-30: ljang skya rdo rje rgya gram ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:160b-31: shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-2: lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-4: nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-6: byang shar sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-7: ljang ser g-yung drung rdo rje mtshan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-9: mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-10: skyes bu chen po'i longs spyod 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-11: cha mthun yum dang 'khril par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-12: aom bi ta dzny'a na ta na sam bo ga ta h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-13: aom dharma mu ni na sa na sa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-14: aom bi ha ra phra mo tha na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-15: aom dzny'a na lo tra sam bo ga ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-16: aom ratna ma ru dhe sa grubm h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-17: aom ma h'a shu ti mu sa mo ha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-18: aom buddha buddha sarya na ku m'a ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-19: aom nam ga ga na si ta yo ga h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-20: aom ni sa ha hi he hu mu ga ra ba ri h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-21: 'khor lo'i gsang sngags rab brjod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-22: lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-23: drag po'i rgyu 'bras sbyong byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-24: gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-25: rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-26: shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-27: gnas mgo skyabs dang dbang du mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-28: nyon mongs las kyis dregs pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-29: rang rgyu zhi nas byang sems bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-31: snying po mdongs gsol dul bar 'gyur aom trag sha ka sarba ra ma ma sa h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-33: bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:161a-34: bstan pa myur du spel cig /
