K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-13: dpal ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-14: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-15: dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-16: bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-17: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-18: yongs rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-19: dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-20: dbus su padma'i rigs rgyal po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-21: gtso bo padma rdo rje'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-22: zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-23: rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169a-24: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-0: @169b [?] gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-1: rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-2: rin chen phyogs kyi tshon mdangs gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-3: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-4: ral gri padma sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-5: gtso bo padma'i drug mtshan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-6: stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-7: sangs rgyas spyan mdzes m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-8: dkar mo dam tshig sgrol ma dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-9: mdog bzang phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-11: thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-13: rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-14: dmar mdangs dkar dang gser gyi mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-15: n'i la ka ta'i mdog 'tsher zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-18: g-yas na 'khor lo go rims bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-19: rdo rje skyil krung legs brgyan brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-20: gzhan yang khro bo'i tshogs 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-21: phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-22: sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-23: rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-24: khri tshogs yang sprul mtshon cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-25: rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-26: khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-27: mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-28: dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-29: rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:169b-31: gsang sngags drag po brjod mdzad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-2: skad gcig gsal bar rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-3: phyi yi gnas su spro zhing bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-4: gsang sngags rgyun gyi skal bar byed; ;h'um aa la la ho //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-8: ha la ha la bhi shan h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-9: stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-10: rab 'khrug bred rgyas rmongs pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-11: 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-12: rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-13: dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-14: rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-15: dbang bskur byin rlabs rdzogs gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-16: dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-17: aom padma kunda li hri da ya na bi mu ku ru ha na da ha h'um phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-18: gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-19: 'jig rten gsum po sdud pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-20: pho nya rdo rje k'i la ya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-21: dregs byed gtso bo dag rengs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-22: de nas bcom ldan bde chen skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-23: sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-24: rdo rje se gol lan gsum brdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-25: dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-27: ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje las; ;gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-28: dregs byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170a-30: sangs rgyas bstan pa log mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-0: log @170b ba'i lam la mngon zhen cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-1: mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus snyems nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-2: 'jig rten gsum dag pung byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-4: khro bo'i rol pa mdzad mod kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-5: 'dul bar gzigs nas bka' gros mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-6: kye ma 'dul pa'i tshogs chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-7: 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-8: da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las; ;log pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-10: khro bo'i tshul du byung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-11: de tshe sems can thams cad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-12: shin tu khro zhing gtum par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-13: de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-14: mnar med la sogs gnas ngan len //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-15: mi bzad sdug bsngal mtha' la brten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-16: ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-17: shin tu gti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-18: de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-19: rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-22: dus ngan rigs ngan phra men ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-23: gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-25: 'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-26: sangs rgyas thusg rje rnam 'phrul bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-27: nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-28: lta ba ri bo mthu brnyes tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-29: da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:170b-30: rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-2: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-3: mngon spyod rol ba'i thabs chen gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-4: 'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab; ;srid gsum gdug cing gtum pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-5: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-6: shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-7: khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-8: khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-9: 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-10: sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-11: khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-12: rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las; ;phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-14: ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-15: khams gsum brlag pa'i lam la zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-17: mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-18: khro bo'i tshogs kyis sbyor bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-21: rnam par 'phrul ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgral bya'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-22: de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-23: padma gar gyi dbang phyug skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171a-24: ma tang ru tra la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-0: bdud kyi tshogs @171b bcas 'dul ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-1: yum chen sku gcig rol mdzad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-2: byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-5: dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag nyid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-6: dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-7: zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-8: padma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-9: rin chen rgyun sogs dbu rgyan bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-11: snod gcig dus gcig sprul pa mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-12: mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-13: drag po mthing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-14: 'khor lo rtsibs drug par khyams nyis rim ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-15: kun tu zla gam sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-16: rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyun dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-17: tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la brten cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-18: 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-19: nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-20: smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-21: 'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-22: gzugs khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na; ;drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-23: lha chen phyogs skyong tshogs kyis rtsig pa byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:171b-24: sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-2: theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-3: glang chen ka la ling gis ka gtan byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-4: gling bzhi'i mi rnams dgos 'dod skong ba'i phyir; ;gza' skar mig tshags byas pas 'gyur ldog med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-5: 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-6: seng+ge ka la sha yis ka gzhu byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-7: 'khor ba'i gcod rnying gtan nas spyad pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-8: seng+ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'dzag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-9: thod rus bar khyams rdo rje'i gzar gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-10: zhing chen rnga yab bla re 'phan gdugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-11: thugs rje byang sems kun tu khyab pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-12: nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-13: sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug gis dus bzhir phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-14: khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-15: rin chen khri dang padma nyi zla gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-16: gser gyi seng+ge spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-17: drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-18: khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyams dag la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-19: thugs rje nyi ma nyi shu brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-20: 'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng+ge nyi shu brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-21: sprul sku thob pas dbang po nyi shu brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-22: kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-23: rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-24: mgon gnas dben bar gzhan dag gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-25: mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172a-26: 'phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-0: rigs bzhi khrag @172b 'thung he ru ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-1: bzhugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-2: de nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-4: sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-5: chags par gyur par padma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-6: che ba'am yon tan lung du ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-7: mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri med pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-8: ma chags padma can gyi lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-9: stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-10: nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-12: thabs dang shes rab ya bral bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-13: spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-14: ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-16: yang gab sbas pa ye shes lung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-18: shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-19: thabs dang shes rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-20: tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-21: bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-22: gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-23: aom padma shr'i he ru ka padma kro ti shva ri h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-24: mah'a tsanda sarbba dushta na phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-25: dkyil 'khor bdag po rngam brjid cha lugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-26: 'bar ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-27: dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-28: dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba dbyings su gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:172b-29: ral ba'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-0: smin ma khro gnyer sma ra @173a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-2: lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha byad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-3: bco lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-4: rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshog pas gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-5: bcu drug rol ba'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-6: sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-7: 'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-8: khro bo'i tshogs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-9: 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-10: bde gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-11: rang gi zhing sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-12: thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la dgod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-13: phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-14: yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba skyed par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-15: gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-18: aom sarbba ta th'a ga t'a w'a ka badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-19: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konya ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-20: 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-21: mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo khams rgya chen mo drug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-22: zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs su cha lugs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173a-23: rigs drug mtshan ma cha lugs ci lta bu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-0: phyi rol dkyil @173b 'khor khyab bar spros byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-1: 'gro rnams dud sogs khams rnams dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-2: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen padmo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-3: ral gri kha tv'am rtse gsum dril bu bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-4: g-yon pa bdud rtsi thod ba gang ba thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-5: mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-6: rang gi phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-7: las kyi khams rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-8: dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-9: long ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-10: sku mdog mtshan ma sna tshogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-11: phyag sprel zangs kyi thod pa thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-12: aom shr'i kha'i aom shv'a ri kha'i tram/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-14: dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-15: thod rus bar khyams gnas su dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-18: lcags kyi sbyang mo brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-19: ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-20: me ri sprin ltar gtibs pa ril zhing 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-21: bar khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun tu 'khod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-22: aom tib ta tsakra sho na mu mo ra kham h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-23: ku ku ra yaksha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-24: dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-25: dza h'um bam ho phyag rgya las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-26: mgo dgu brtsegs pa'i rkang gcig bo; ;mgo brgyad lag brgyad rol pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-27: mgo drug lag drug rkang drug dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-28: mgo gsum rkang gsum lag gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:173b-29: dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-2: de dag rol ba'i byin rlabs las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-3: steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-4: thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-6: rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-7: aom dzi na la to tsa ram yaksha ku ru ban tsatsha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-8: gzhan yang sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-9: bse yi byan lag dmar po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-10: dung bya khrung khrung la sogs rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-11: 'jig rten tsam pa'i tshogs kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-12: aom ha ha ru ru ma h'a tsende sha ri bi sha na ya h'um h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-13: kun gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-14: aom padma bi ta si to ha he tsa kra bhyo phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-16: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-17: ae aa ma ra li h'um dza /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-19: aom bhyo ae aa ra li dza zhes brjod pas khro bo 'khor lo ma lus par byon zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-20: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas he ru ka chen po nyid kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-21: rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams dam tshig bkod par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-22: de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lo tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-23: ma lus ral bar byin brlabs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-24: bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-25: rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174a-26: aom hu lu hu lu ram dza la ae aa ra li dza:h'um bam ho:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-0: aom @174b ma tra ru tra ha la ha la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-1: dug gsum dngos po spyang ba'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-2: rngam pa'i khro tshogs phyogs bcur spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-3: khro 'dzum phyag rgya bstan mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-4: he he ru ru'i gsang sngags brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-5: ha la rdo rje'i rgod rgyangs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-6: bdud dang srin mo la sogs brgyal bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-7: aom sarba pa pa ka ra he ta ba bye sha ma ta ru tra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-8: aom sarba pa pa he ta byi sha kha tang ru tra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-9: aom sarba pa pa ka ra he ta ba byi sha kha tang ru tra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-10: dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor pho nya'i tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-11: dpal chen rdo rje tho thog ser chen 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-12: h'um dang phat kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-13: h'um dang phat kyis byin brlabs bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-14: rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skem //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-15: rdo rje mtshon cha gnam lcags thu sum 'dril //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-16: gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-17: rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-18: nyams pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar rlogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-19: ye shes thugs rje aa la la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-20: aom mah'a shr'i he ru ka bhandha bhandha /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-22: ha la ha la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-23: de nas bdud dang ru tra bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-24: rdo rje mtshon chas bsgral bsgral nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-25: 'khor gyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-26: sha khrag nang rol bdud rtsi dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-27: rus rkang dbang po bcas pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:174b-28: tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-0: @175a *// kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-1: mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-2: thugs rje rnam dag padma'i rang bzhin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-3: thugs kar lam las sprul pa'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-4: phyogs bzhi dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-5: grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-6: dpal lus khyab bar 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-7: dbang mchog lhun gyis grub pa'i rta skad can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-8: thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-9: ye shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-10: smin mdzad smon lam yun ring grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-11: dmigs pa'i mtha' bral padma yum gyi tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-12: chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-13: chags med thugs rje padma'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-14: sgra skad thams cad mtha' las grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-15: zab dang rgyang ring chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-16: shangs kyi rlung sgrom dug gsum rtsad nas gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-17: zhal gyi ho ma la 'brel bas rgyud lnga gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-18: rno dbang mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-19: le brgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-20: rol ba'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-21: gshog bzhi bskyod pas 'phrin las rnam bzhi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-22: zhabs rol bas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175a-23: sku che yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-0: thugs mchog @175b ye shes stong nyid nyi ma brdal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-1: ye shes lha mtshog byin rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-2: ngo mtshar rol bas khro bo kun gyi rje //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-3: dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-4: de nas bde chen dbang gi skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-5: 'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-6: rdo rje gsang ba'i sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-7: gsang ba'i byin rlabs bskyed par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-8: aom a'a h'um sarba panytsa aa mri ta sa ma yo gi siddhi h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-9: pa to ka ka ma la su ta sa h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-10: aom badzra sa ma ya kro dha sa ma ya aom a'a:h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-11: mah'a yo gi tsitta ram pa rakta ma la kha'i kha'i h'um//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-12: aom kham kha le la ru lu ru lu h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-13: ai dha na sa ma ya aa la la ho zhes rdo rjes glu blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-15: bde ba chen pos mchod pas chim par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-16: de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te dbang bskur ba'i thugs sogs kyis bdag po rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-17: dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-18: de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:175b-20: ma ma trag sha ru tra ma ma bhyo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-0: aom ru lu ru lu h'um bhyo padma @176a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-1: hrid dha ru ru h'um bhyo h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-3: gsang chen 'dus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-4: de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-5: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-6: bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-7: khro bo'i rgyal po sku chen dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-9: gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-10: dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-12: chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas gzhal yas khang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-13: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi cod pan can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-14: rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-15: rdo rje bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-16: dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-17: shes rab thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-18: dus gsum gcig car sgrol bas tshar gsum brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-19: khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-20: mi gnas mya ngan gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-21: ma bsgribs ma gsal go 'phang mdzes par mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-22: mi ldog g-yul sgrol stobs drug mdzes par mgyogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176a-23: gar yang thogs med byin rlabs shugs dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-0: 'tsher skad gdangs snyan ma @176b srid spro ba 'gyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-1: kham dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbugs 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-2: dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-3: rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-4: don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-5: ljang khu'i me 'bar rta mgo'i rang bzhin ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-6: 'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-7: byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-8: rdog ma le brgan 'bar de'i khyad par mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-9: stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab 'byams na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-10: rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-11: zhing khams gsum dag ma lus dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-12: shes rab thabs su 'brel ba'i rta skad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-13: grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-14: dang po'i gdangs kyis rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-15: gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rab rtse nas 'tsher //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-16: gsang snyan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-17: bcu drug slad ma'i ngan rtogs thar lam ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-18: spyan mig glog ltar 'gyur ba cher 'phags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-19: sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-20: 'tsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-21: mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-22: rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thabs rtogs pa'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-23: h'um las dpal chen khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:176b-24: gnas ni sna yi dbugs ring dro ba lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-2: shangs kyi rlung sgrom yangs pas ye shes srog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-3: gsang ba'i 'tshub mas sdug bsngal snying nas 'byin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-4: rgya chen sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-5: 'khor ba'i rgya che lugs las ldog pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-6: rigs kyi rlung gis drug lnga dbyings su sgrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-7: zlum dkar bzang ra ma rno dpal tshems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-8: zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-9: ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-10: zhi rgyas dbang bdud drag po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-11: cir yang 'gyur ba'i ho ma khung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-12: las lnga 'brel ba'i zhal zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-13: 'khor ba yongs su smin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-14: las mang nyon mongs dbang btsan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-15: skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-16: des smin mdzad pa chen po yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-17: 'jug ldog cir yang gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-18: rjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-19: 'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-20: yig 'bru'i rgyu nyid bde gshegs thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-21: rdo rje myu gu ting 'dzin thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-23: rig byed ye shes phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-24: yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-25: yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-26: srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-27: rgyu dang las kyi rim pa'o; ;de phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-28: snying po phyag mtshan phra mo dag //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-29: bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177a-30: chos sku chu yi zla ba bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-0: sna tshogs snang la rang @177b bzhin med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-1: dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-2: gar gyi dbang phyug rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-3: shar du rol ba'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-4: khro chen snying 'byin kha tv'am 'bar ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-5: rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhags pas rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-6: de bzhin lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-7: thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-8: rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-9: me yi zhags pa dag dang khyung gi khra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-10: sdigs mdzub rtse la ye shes 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-11: rdo rje kha tv'am ga ni rab tu 'khrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-12: rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-13: rtse gsum rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-14: ye nas ma skyes dang ba'i cho 'phrul ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-15: ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-16: rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-17: klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-18: rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-19: sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-20: gsang ba'i yum bzhis sku la 'khril byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-21: byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-22: rdo rje dra bas rin chen glog 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-23: khyung gshog aa mo theb gshog sder mo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-24: sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-25: thabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pas g-yas nas brkyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-26: srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-27: shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g-yon nas khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:177b-28: thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i byin rlabs che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-0: @178a *// sprul pas 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-1: sna tshogs rol ba'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-2: 'phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-3: dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-4: rgya bye'u lcags kyi shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-5: rdo rje 'chol bas lho yi phyogs na brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-6: bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang ba brkyang; ;sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar mtshams su gyon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-7: shu ken dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-8: mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-9: sprul nag 'khril ba'i zhabs kyis 'og phyogs 'dul bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-10: khro brgyad gnon cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-11: dug chen bcom zhing sgal tshigs gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-12: brang gnon ldan pa 'joms shing 'jigs mdzad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-13: 'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-14: sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-15: thugs rje'i rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-16: 'phrin las rol bas h'um mdzad h'um gis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-17: sa bcu zil gnon stobs bcu dbang dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-18: de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-19: dam tshig gar gyi byin rlabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-20: rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-21: yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-22: dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178a-23: mnyes mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-0: @178b ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-1: gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-2: gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-3: rab tu smra bar gang byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-4: sgeg pa'i tshig gis brgyan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-5: sri zhu'i sems kyis gdungs pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-6: ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-7: lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-8: rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-9: gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya bzhi gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-10: byang chub sems tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-11: thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-12: dbyings phyug sprul tshogs bsam yas dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-13: nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku ///
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-14: stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-16: dus gsum kun gyi gnas dang rten //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-17: phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-18: dam tshig chen po de nyid mang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-19: phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-20: thams cad padmo rnam dag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-21: cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-22: thugs rje chags pa'i 'phrin las kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-23: dbang drag 'phrin las gnod sbyin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-24: gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-25: las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-26: gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-27: lhun gyis dang bas kun tu 'joms //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-28: snying ma lnga brgya dus kyi mtha'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:178b-29: srid gsum sems can 'dul dka' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-2: gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-3: de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-5: rnam par thar ba dbu gsum bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-6: g-yas dkar g-yon dmar dbus mthing ga /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-7: ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-8: g-yas pas rdo rje rde'u chung dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-9: mdung rtse gsum pa 'dzin pas rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-10: dril bu rgyu zhags thod rlon g-yon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-11: bskal pa'i me ri sprul zhags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-12: thod rlon phreng brgyan du byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-13: sgeg pa dpa' bo 'jigs su rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-14: dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-15: snying rje rngam dang zhi ba'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-16: sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-17: 'jigs byed khro bo rnam par rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-18: skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-19: mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-20: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-21: longs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-22: mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan steng na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-23: sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-24: zab mo rgya chen chos ma bstan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-25: dngos dang dngos med gsal byed pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-26: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-27: sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-28: phal mang bkod pa'i sa rnams su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-29: dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-30: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-31: thams cad mtshan ma nam mkha'i dngos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-32: de nyid sgro btags chos dang bral //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-33: kun rgyan byams sems de kho na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179a-34: rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-0: he ru @179b ka yi bde chen dbyings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-1: chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-3: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-5: dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-6: de nas bcom ldan dpal gyis skus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-7: gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-8: thugs rje brjid pa'i stobs ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-9: yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-10: nam mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-11: cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-12: zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-13: tsham ngam chen po'i stangs stabs rngom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-14: sku mdog brgyad kyis brjid pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-15: phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-16: ham lnga 'brel bar gyur ba'i zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-17: zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-18: skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa'i tshems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-19: rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i dbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-20: ting 'dzin nam mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-21: 'phrin las rgya mtsho'i rlabs tshogs ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-22: byin rlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-23: mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-24: bdud dang srin mo 'joms byed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-25: khams gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-26: stong gsum dus gcig bsgral ba'i zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-27: rtog pa 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:179b-28: sku gsung thugs mchog yon tan ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-2: rgya chen yan lag rags pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-3: grangs ma rkyen dang 'tsham pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-4: bkur gshog gtso bo mthong bas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-5: khyad zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-6: gdangs chen stong gsum gang bas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-7: don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-8: gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-9: thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid; ;ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-10: ma 'gag sa le mkhyen pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-11: med la zad mi shes pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-12: gcig la 'dod rgur bsgyur bas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-13: gnod sbyin pham par mdzad pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-14: thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-15: rims bral nyam thag rol pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-16: 'khor ba yun ring mgon mdzad brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-17: gcig car zil gyis mnan pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-18: bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-19: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-20: zil mnan nga rgyal bcag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-21: des su ro yi nang nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-23: so'am sen mo gcad par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-24: de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-25: rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-26: de thogs nam mkha' la song nas; ;rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-27: aom bh'u ru na ra sa ma ta ya h'um phad/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180a-28: gar gyi dbang phyug nga rgyal gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-0: dregs byed tshogs @180b rnams zil mnan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-1: brtul zhugs spyod pas glu blang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-2: brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-3: yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-4: bcom ldan padma he ru ka'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-5: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-6: ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-7: mtshan nyid cig tu ma nges pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-8: sku gsung thugs sprul bsam yas che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-9: rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-10: byin rlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-11: khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-12: rang gi dkyil 'khor rnams gsal las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-13: byin rlabs 'gro la rgya chen ston //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-14: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang; ;sprul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-15: tshig gi gsung rab rig pa'i gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-16: bzhi la sum bcu drug gis brjid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-17: dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-18: dug lnga bde ba chen pos spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-19: dbyings las ye shes rol ba'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-20: skye 'gro ma lus rgyas btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-21: rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-22: rgyal ba gang gis thugs rjes kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-23: 'di la skyabs su yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-24: srid pa gsum du dag byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-25: srid pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya gsang bas 'debs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-26: thig le chos sku rig pa'i mtshog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-27: gar gyi dbang phyug ces su bsngags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:180b-29: khro bo rdom brjid ston pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-2: gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-3: yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-4: mchod ba rgya chen phul byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-5: 'gro ba rtse ba'i sems can las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-6: sgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-7: bcom ldan 'das dngos grub kun gyi bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-8: gdul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-9: thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-10: de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-11: bsgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-12: las kyi cho ga ji lta bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-13: yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-14: tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-15: thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-17: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-21: rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-22: rnam gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-23: las kyi dngos grub sgrub pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-24: gnas bzang dag tu brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-25: phyag rgya'i grogs la brten pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-26: bzlas brjod yan lag ma nyams par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-27: gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-28: sum 'bum dag tu brjod byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-29: rol pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-30: mchog chen mtshan ma ma nyams pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-31: rab brtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181a-32: khro bo chen po'i tsham ngam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-0: yungs kar thal ba la @181b sogs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-1: sumbha ni yi sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-2: yi dvags gshin rje bskrad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-3: de nas dri zhim sbyar bar yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-4: dag byed chu yis legs bkrus te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-5: me tog phreng sogs rgyan gyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-6: gsung gi phyag rgya byin rlabs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-7: dpa' bos rang gi khyim du blang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-8: glu drug dbyangs drug bcas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-9: khro rgyal rol ba'i bro yis sbyangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-10: bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-11: rgya khyon 'dom gang khru yis bstod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-12: ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-13: rdzas dang sa gzhi dag bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-14: sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-15: bsrung zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-16: yab yum sgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-17: dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-18: mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-19: srung ba'i 'khor lo legs ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-20: stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-21: dkyil 'khor mnyes sogs rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-22: ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-23: bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-24: aom bi ra na trag sha ta ta la ta'i lo ma ta ya manta tsantra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-26: zur ma chag par brjod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-28: gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-29: 'bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-30: langs te kun tu lta bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:181b-31: de tshe rnal 'byor dbang po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-2: rta mchog sngags kyi dbang du bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-3: rdo rje khyung gshog phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-4: don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang brdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-5: ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-6: ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-7: dkyil 'khor mtha' ma bskor byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-8: mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-9: lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-10: de nas brtul zhugs chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-11: go la lang+gha mnan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-12: bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-13: ro de gser du gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-14: de ni mchod dang sbyin pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-15: rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-17: ro langs sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o;;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-18: /de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-19: gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-20: 'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-21: thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-23: rim pa bzhin du phan gdags mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-24: dbang thob dam tshig la gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-25: yid mthun gnas mchog bzang po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-26: mig sman sbyor ba bsgrubs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-27: byin rlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-28: rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182a-29: rang gi gsang sngags 'bum rdzogs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-0: mtshan mo phra mo mthong ba @182b dang; ;bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-1: dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-2: phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-3: rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-4: 'bum phrag gsum du gsung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-5: aom padma ma tsa ga hru aa la sa ma ra si ti yo na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-6: dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-7: grong mtha'i gnas su 'gro byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-8: dus kyang ma mthong mtshan mo rung;/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-9: lha 'dre gtum po'i grong du bsdad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-10: rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-11: mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-12: der ni bhandha mtshan ldan du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-13: gzi chen mar ni bltas nas su; ;mtshan gcig yal bar bsngags bzlas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-14: ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-15: skya rengs dang po 'char dus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-16: dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-17: glu dang bro yi brtul zhugs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-18: lha rnams kun gyi stangs stabs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-19: gnas de'i bdag po dbang du sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-20: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-21: slar nyid mig sman shas shig byug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-22: de nas 'khor gyi tshogs bsgo zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-23: skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-24: padma bsgrub pa'i aan rdza lis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-26: gzhan yang ri lu'i sgrub thabs ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-27: bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-28: rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsres te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-29: thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:182b-30: dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-0: thabs dang shes rab ldan gnas @183a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-2: su;/ gar gyi dbang phyug sku bsgoms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-3: yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-4: 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-5: mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang; ;bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-6: rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-7: rin chen za ma tog tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-8: dkyil 'khor de yi dbus bzhag pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-9: srung ba'i tsa kras bsrung bya zhing; ;rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-10: 'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-12: aom mah'a padma sam po ta hu lu h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-13: de nas ri lu de blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-14: kha 'am lag tu bzung byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-16: ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-17: lha yi gnas mchog nyams dga' bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-18: snga dro gcig gis 'khor bar nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-19: gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-20: skyes bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-21: bdud rtsi rgyal po aa ru ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-22: gser gyi mdog tu 'dug pas mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-23: nyi shu rtsa gcig ra por sba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-24: sul rangs rgyas par gyur pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-25: ba gcin phur mo thal ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-26: ser skya'i ba mar btso bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-27: de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas; ;nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag zhi bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-28: zho re'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-29: dkyil 'khor gsang ba la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183a-30: gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgoms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-0: rig @183b 'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-1: mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mthong bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-2: yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-3: aom padmo bi ha ra ha ra ta sa ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-4: gsang sngags sum 'bum ma rdzogs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-5: aa ru ra yi 'bras bzang stong gi tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-6: legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-7: nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-8: tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs; ;rgas la sogs pa'i skyon sel cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-10: de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-11: kha ra bu ram nye shing dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-12: zur rdul mu zi la sogs pas; ;rang gi cho ga shes pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-13: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-14: gar dbang dkyil 'khor la ni brten byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-15: so sor ma nyams sbyangs pa'i sa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-16: ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-17: ba yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-18: mtshan ma ma byung bar du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-19: de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-20: aom padmo ai dra dra aa he de bi na h'um phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-21: aom padmo ra rgya aa ga ra ta dar sha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-22: aom padmo sa mo na bi sha le h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-23: aom ghu li sa bo ta ma go ra na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-24: aom padmo me sha aa na nad ta ya ka ra h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-25: de dag las rnams 'grub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-26: rtag tu rang gis 'char byas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:183b-27: gsang ba'i sngags lam la brten nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med @184a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-1: pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-2: thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-3: de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-4: phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-5: snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-6: mchog gi dngos grub skyed byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-7: rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-8: dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-9: bhandha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-11: tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-12: de ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-13: ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-14: gar dbang lha la mos pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-15: gsang sngags rgyal po bstod byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-16: sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-17: mtha' sngags gzhan gyis brgyan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-18: rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-19: aom aa su sha aom aa yu sha so ta brum//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-20: 'od zer du ba lta bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-21: phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byur ba'i dus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-22: bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-23: brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-24: sku gsung thugs mchog phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-25: gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-26: aom ae ka te ba ga te ma tam ka te sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-27: ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgya gsal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-28: gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184a-29: rdo rje padmor ldan byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-0: thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul @184b la; ;gzi ldan gsang ba ae gru gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-1: nyi ma padma shes rab ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-2: so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-3: aom brum padma a'a yu she /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-4: byin rlabs rnam par 'phro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-5: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs bskul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-6: byang chub sems mchog tshe yi rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-7: sgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-8: bad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-9: dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-10: h'um gis gsor zhing aa yis bskyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-11: yang dang yang du bskul ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-12: sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-13: de la byang chub sems mchog rgyun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-14: bhandha mtshan ldan nang du bcug //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-15: rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-16: bkra shis tshigs bcad glu brang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-17: bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-18: longs spyod ston mo kun gsol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-19: dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-21: tshe sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-22: de nas gar gyi lha mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-23: thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-24: phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-25: rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-26: rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-27: dngos grub snying po kun bsdus bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-28: chos rnams ma lus rnams brtags nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-29: rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:184b-30: de nas 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-2: dang por bsod nams tshogs bsags shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-3: rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-4: phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-5: lha nyid nye bar bsgoms byas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-6: dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-7: rigs kyi lha yi dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-8: rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-9: dri dbyibs kha dog ro la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-10: sha lnga bdud rtsir bcas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-11: bhandha mtshan ldan lnga ru ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-13: rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-14: so sor spang ba sbyang byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-15: phyag rgya sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-16: rigs kyi dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-17: mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-18: las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-19: aom padmo badzra hri ghu na siddhi sarbba bantstsha aa mri ta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-21: de las 'od dang du ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-22: dri dang lha mo rtags dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-23: bzlas brjod thun mongs khyad par dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-25: de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-26: de dag btags tsam sbyang bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-27: mkha' 'gro rol pa'i brtul zhugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-28: bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-29: dkyil 'khor bkod pa rgyan dang bcas; ;khro bo 'bar bar zhal bsgyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-30: yab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185a-32: dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas bzhugs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-0: bdud kyi @185b gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-1: slar nyid khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-2: gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs kar zhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-3: ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-4: dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-6: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-7: mchod bstod dga' bas mnyes byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-8: bro gar glu yis thugs dam bskang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-9: khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus; ;ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-10: aom mah'a sarba ta th'a ga ta bantstsha aa mri ta ru lu ru lu h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-11: ji srid mtshan mas yang dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-12: sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-13: de nas rta mgrin phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-14: sgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i don //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-15: rdo rje rta mchog phyag rgya che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-16: bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-17: rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-18: phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs pa'i glus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-19: dkyil 'khor lha dang bla ma mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-20: dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-21: dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-22: lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-23: dam med dbang po sngags kyis bskrad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-24: bdud rtsi gtor bas lus brlag 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-25: rang gi ye shes las las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-26: de nas las mdzad srung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-27: mgron tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-28: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-29: rab tshogs 'gro ba'i don phyir bsngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:185b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-1: pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-2: de nas rta mchog rol pa'i sku dbus su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-3: dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshul gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-4: 'gro rnams kun la bskul mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-5: 'phrin las gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-6: bsam gtan las kyis 'byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-7: zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-8: mnan zlog rengs dang gsad la sogs; ;ting 'dzin gsal nam goms pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-9: bdag dang gzhan don las la sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-10: zhi ba zhi ba'i yi ge ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-11: bsgrub bya zla dkyil la bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-12: rnam par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-13: dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-14: byang chub sems kyi bde bskyed de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-15: zug rdu rtog pa rnam par sel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-16: yun ring goms par bstan pa'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-17: me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-18: rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs bgyis te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-20: 'khor los bsgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-21: ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid; ;rang gi btsun pa'i tshogs dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-22: bde gshegs byin rlabs kun bsdus shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-23: sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-24: 'phrin las sgo nas brtsam par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-25: sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-26: rin chen sna bdun gser la sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-27: mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186a-28: tshogs rnams rang gis longs spyod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-0: 'gro @186b rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-1: thabs dang dbang du bsdu phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-2: 'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-4: chags pa chen pos 'gro 'dul ba; ;rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-5: lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang sdud cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-6: 'khor bcas dang bar gyur pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-7: gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-9: gang zhig gsang ba'i las grub mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-10: de ni mthing nag las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-12: bsgrub bya dang phra zhing dgug pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-13: me yi dkyil 'khor la bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-14: shin tu ma rungs mtshon char ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-15: dkon mchog gsum la bsdo byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-16: skye bo yongs la 'tshe ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-17: slob dpon kun la bsngo ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-18: sangs rgyas thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-19: las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-21: sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-22: bya khyi lce spyang sha za dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-24: bstod pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-25: til tsam med par zos pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-26: sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-27: de dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-28: dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:186b-29: aom bhu ta tsakra sa ma ba ga ti lo ts'a na che ge mo shantim ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-0: aom ratna sam bha wa gu ru m'a ma k'i che ge @187a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-2: aom y'a mi te sa ra ba ra ho che ge mo wa sham ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-3: aom karma santi pa kro ta ni che ge mo h'a y'a sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-4: rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-5: rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-6: sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-7: cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-8: gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-9: dbye zhing dgug dang bskrad pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-10: mnan la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-11: rang gi lta ba'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgos pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-14: bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-15: de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-16: 'phrin las kun gyi mchog gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-17: rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-19: gar gyi dbang phyug phyag rgya'i sku //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-20: rnam spro lta yi dkyil 'khor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-21: so so'i 'dod don sgrub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-22: rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-23: padma rgya gram la sogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-24: las kun lha yi nga rgyal gyis; ;mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-25: gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gzhir bzhag nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187a-26: lha yi dkyil 'khor sgrub byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-0: mtshan ma'i rdzas la brten byas @187b te; ;brten par mchod cing mnyes pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-1: las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-2: aom ma ma sarba bi ta ha ra ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-3: sarba sa mo ku ni lam pa shantim ku ru da ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-4: pushtim ratna ma ku ru sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-5: pa sham ku ru padmo hri da ya aam/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-6: stam pa na mo sha aa karma pa ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-9: nga rgyal ldan pas lag thogs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-10: gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-11: gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-12: dbang la sogs ni bsgrub 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-13: de dag de dang mthun pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-14: las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-15: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-16: rang gi las la rnam par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-17: dgug la sogs pa'i las dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-18: lcags kyu la sogs las kyis bsgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-19: rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral bar; ;cir 'dod bya ba mthar phyin 'grub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-20: thabs dang sgrub byed gsang sngags la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-21: so so'i las kyis mtha' brgyan te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-22: yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes thogs su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-23: sum 'bum grangs kyis bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-24: aom bi lo gi ma ma dushta na ga ga na ru lu ru lu h'um phat//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-25: dang po rtsa ba'i sngags ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-26: sum 'bum dag du bzlas byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:187b-27: slar yang de yi grangs mthun pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol ba'i rgyud chen po @188a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-1: las; rten gyi sgo nas spyad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-2: 'gro gnas thams cad srung byad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-3: phan gdags cho ga bzang po nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-4: rgyal ba'i byin rlabs gnas pa'i thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-5: rnam pa yis ni brtsams byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-6: grong khyer la sogs srung 'dod pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-7: chu dang bye ma la sogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-8: gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-9: aom na mo ku ru sarba bi da ra ni mo sa de ni ra sha kra ra kra ta h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-10: rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-11: stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-12: gang srung ba dag shis 'gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-14: gzhan yang ri'u cha dgu pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-15: 'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-16: mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-17: gsang sngags rgyal po dgod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-18: dbus su dgod pa'i gsang sngags ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-19: yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-20: de yi mthar mar aom mthar he he dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-21: hu ru kam pa bag sha ha h'a ma mra bri h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-22: de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-23: srung ba'i sngags dang bcas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-24: gur gum bzang pos byugs byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-25: rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-26: gang gi ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-27: btags pas srung pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188a-28: gzhan yang bum pa bzang po ru //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-0: bdud @188b rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-1: rang gi gsang sngags yungs kar bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-2: gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-3: sngags thod srung bar 'gyur bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi; ;gsang ba 'di nyid bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-5: phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems bcas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-6: de la thams cad dga' mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-7: lha rnams kun la slar bsgo mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-8: de dag dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-9: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-12: srung ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-099-004:188b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so ////
